programme.title: House Of Fury
programme.desc: Teddy Yu is a Chinese chiropractor and a widowed father who claims to have had a hidden life as a heroic bodyguard for retired secret agents. However, his children Nicky and Natalie never believed him even though they both learnt kungfu from him. That is until one day Teddy is kidnapped!(n)

programme.title: The Yuppie Fantasia
programme.desc: Leung Foon works at an advertising agency and is separated from his wife because his wife's career proves to be more successful than his. He tries to get back with his former girlfriend and flirts with his female boss, but finally realises that he was much better off where he started.(n)

programme.title: Rhapsody Of Kidnapping
programme.desc: When three tech founders end up handing over their latest inventions to a sleazy tycoon who takes them for granted, they decide to kidnap the man's wife, mistress, love child and her grandma for a huge random.(n)

programme.title: Girl's Generation
programme.desc: Girl's Generation follows three groups of students as they prepare to take part in the National Students' Talent competition and look to win the title by performing on stage.(n)

programme.title: Sisterhood
programme.desc: Sei and Ling, former masseuses in Macau, had the best time together before Sei got married and moved to Taiwan. Decades later after Ling passes away, Sei revisits her old life and learns that her late best friend had kept secrets she never knew.(n)

programme.title: Bride Wars
programme.desc: A remake of the well-known Hollywood romantic-comedy of the same title. As a pair of brides-to-be prepare for their big day, their friendship is put to the test when they battle it out for the perfect wedding scheduled on the same day.(n)

programme.title: The Yuppie Fantasia 3
programme.desc: Leung Foon, 52 years old, is a callous corporate executive sleeping regularly with his much-younger secretary. When his 21-year-old daughter - taken away by his ex-wife at age eight - shows up with her mother's ashes, Leung must learn to be a better man.(n)

programme.title: Funny Soccer
programme.desc: Far from its glory days, Victory Football Club is now facing bankruptcy and only the players who have problems are left behind. Despite the hardship, they try their best hoping to get through the football season and raise funds to avoid being dismissed.(n)

programme.title: All You Need Is Love
programme.desc: This light-hearted romantic comedy set in the scenic Penghu Islands in Taiwan stars Shu Qi and Richie Jen about a wealthy girl running into a local hostel owner whose business is in danger of closing down.(n)

programme.title: Killer Limo
programme.desc: Full of sword fights and action-packed sequences, this exciting crime-action movie is about a young woman who seeks revenge against criminal organisations that killed her father in Thailand.(n)

programme.title: Happily Ever After
programme.desc: College student Nam (Michelle Wai) juggles school and a part-time gig as a photographer's assistant for her longtime friend Chun Man (Carlos Chan). With high-school reunion coming up, Nam recalls her abbreviated puppy love with classmate To Chi (Ken Hung).(n)

programme.title: Wine War
programme.desc: A Chinese wine expert residing in France is contacted by his childhood buddy in China to help him auction for a bottle of 1855 vintage wine on behalf of the Chinese government. But little does he realise he is about to enter an age-old feud between rivaling vineyards.(n)

programme.title: Police Story
programme.desc: Jackie Chan plays a honest cop Chan Ka-Kui assigned to protect Salina, whose key testimony could bring down drug baron Chu. However, the witness manages to get away from Ka-Kui. With no evidence against him, Chu is set free. Chu goes on a vendetta to frame Ka-Kui for a murder.(n)

programme.title: In Your Dreams
programme.desc: Heng is a high school student whose mother abandoned the family eight years ago. You Mei is a teacher whose husband is having an affair. When You Mei becomes the temporary teacher at Heng's school, the two lonely souls develop an affectionate bond.(n)

programme.title: Lady Of The Dynasty
programme.desc: Fan Bingbing plays the formidable historical concubine Yang Yuhuan. Known also as one of the four great beauties in Chinese history, Yang Yuhuan's rise to becoming the Emperor's favourite consort, to her eventual downfall, is told in this epic-period romantic drama.(n)

programme.title: Lady Of The Dynasty
programme.desc: Fan Bingbing plays the formidable historical concubine Yang Yuhuan. Known also as one of the four great beauties in Chinese history, Yang Yuhuan's rise to becoming the Emperor's favourite consort, to her eventual downfall, is told in this epic-period romantic drama.(n)

programme.title: Girls VS Gangsters
programme.desc: Xiwen is getting married! Throwing her wild bachelorette party in Ho Chi Minh City are Xiwen's best friend, Kimmy, her fiance's little sister, and the glamourous Jialan. But what starts as a fun night out turns into an evening full of chugging disgusting local spirits.(n)

programme.title: Ip Man
programme.desc: Donnie Yen stars in the biopic of the Wing Chun grandmaster. When the Japanese invade Foshan, The once-reluctant Ip Man begins training his disciple students to defend themselves.(n)

programme.title: Legend Of The Naga Pearls
programme.desc: A group of misfits team up to save humanity from creatures known as the Winged Tribe, who lost their power of flight centuries ago after their war against mankind. But now, they are hell-bent on seeking revenge by obtaining a mystical artifact called the Naga Pearls.(n)

programme.title: Floating City
programme.desc: In 1990s Hong Kong, an orphaned boy (Aaron Kwok) rises above oppressive circumstances to become an esteemed engineer for the British colonies, but still struggles to learn where he came from.(n)

programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: Jiang Shun, a man with low IQ, finds an abandoned baby. He adopts her and names her Chong Ming. Chong Ming grows to be a smart girl who protects her father from being bullied by the village kids. But when she reaches adolescence, she starts feeling that her father's existence is a burden.(n)

programme.title: Extraordinary Mission
programme.desc: An undercover police officer attempts to take down a drug trafficking syndicate called the Twin Eagles from the inside. But his operation starts to spiral out of control when he slowly becomes an addict while trying to gain the leader's trust.(n)

programme.title: Aberdeen
programme.desc: This star-studded drama casts Louis Koo, Gigi Leung, Miriam Yeung, Eric Tsang and Ng Man Tat as members of a family who are on the verge of being destroyed by secrets from the past.(n)

programme.title: Guia In Love
programme.desc: Guia in Love is a series of intertwining love stories set in picturesque Macau. With an elite cast including Stephy Tang, Wilson Lam, Wilfred Lau, Fiona Sit and Vivian Chan, the romantic drama is a gentle insight into the challenges of modern-day relationships.(n)

programme.title: Foolish Plan
programme.desc: A casino worker, a newly-married couple, a Hong Kong billionaire and a Korean mobster are coerced into becoming involved in a complicated plan to obtain an invaluable mirror from the Yuan dynasty.(n)

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 2
programme.desc: When the case of New York Chinatown godfather Uncle Qi's missing son turns into a murder investigation, detective duo Tang and Qin team up again to hunt down the killer - this time with some help from the International Detective Alliance.(n)

programme.title: Wheels On Meals
programme.desc: Two Chinese friends who operate a food truck in Barcelona use their martial arts expertise to help their private investigator friend protect a pickpocket, Sylvia, who has been targeted by a ruthless gang.(n)

programme.title: The Thousand Faces Of Dunjia
programme.desc: Dao, a young constable, discovers a secret society with supernatural abilities that has protected mankind for centuries. As he's drawn into a power struggle within their ranks, he learns that an ancient creature with the power to destroy the world is rising.(n)

programme.title: The Empty Hands
programme.desc: Half-Japanese Hong Kong girl Mari Hirakawa inherits her father's dojo after his death. Forced under her father's training in the past, Mari is resentful of karate and wants to sell the dojo, but the only way for her to succeed is to take on a bet.(n)

programme.title: My Wife Is A Superstar
programme.desc: This romantic-comedy stars Pakho Chau and Annie Liu about the marriage of an actress and an entertainment reporter! My Wife Is A Superstar follows the struggles the couple go through between maintaining their relationship and climbing their respective career ladders.(n)

programme.title: My Wife Is A Superstar
programme.desc: This romantic-comedy stars Pakho Chau and Annie Liu about the marriage of an actress and an entertainment reporter! My Wife Is A Superstar follows the struggles the couple go through between maintaining their relationship and climbing their respective career ladders.(n)

programme.title: The Sinking City Capsule Odyssey
programme.desc: A group of people living in 'space capsules' - large seminar rooms subdivided into small living quarters - struggle to fight for their ideal way of life in the prosperous yet divided city of Hong Kong.(n)

programme.title: Peace Breaker
programme.desc: Aaron Kwok stars as a dirty Kuala Lumpur cop down on his luck who ends up running over a wanted drug trafficker wanted by both the Chinese and Malaysian authorities. Little can he imagine how much worse things are going to become for him.(n)

programme.title: Driving Miss Wealthy
programme.desc: To teach her daughter Jennifer a lesson, billionaire Mr. Fong hires bodyguard-driver Mario to help execute his plan. After declaring sick and bankrupt, Fong sends Jennifer to the ghetto to start from zero. With the help of Mario, Jennifer survives the hardship and finally has her own business.(n)

programme.title: The Founding Of An Army
programme.desc: This is the epic story behind the founding of the People's Liberation Army in China that ultimately laid the foundation for a new republic, featuring a star-studded cast of Chinese actors including Liu Ye, Zhu Yawen and more!(n)

programme.title: A Lifetime Treasure
programme.desc: A precarious, ideal home for the elderly is about to be shaken when gangsters set up a trap to take over the home.(n)

programme.title: The Vanished Murderer
programme.desc: Sean Lau stars as an inspector investigating a prison escape in this period action-thriller. Set in Northern China in the 1930s, the mysterious escape leads the inspector down a rabbit hole of surprising discoveries.(n)

programme.title: Love Is The Only Answer
programme.desc: At Bo and Cheong's wedding reception, the projecter suddenly flashed a clip of Cheong and a sexy girl being intimate. Bo announced that the wedding is cancelled. Within a year, back to being single again, Bo and Cheong maintain a good relationship.(n)

programme.title: Wolf Warrior II
programme.desc: In this action-packed sequel to the 2015 blockbuster hit, China's deadliest Special Forces operative, Leng Feng, returns to action when he crosses paths with a sadistic band of mercenaries terrorising innocent civilians.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools Fall In Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a Chinese folk story, this comedy-drama tells the story of millionaire Ji Fu, the successor of Ji's family, who is arrogant and rude. When Ji Fu gets into an "accident" after being knocked out by second-successor Ji Jack and becomes an idiot, he is left to fend for himself.(n)

programme.title: Demi-Haunted
programme.desc: Wan Fei (Joey Yung) is a promising Chinese Opera singer in love with Ho Fung (Nicholas Tse). She plans to sing for him from the stage, but dies mid-song in an accident. Years later, Wan Fei's ghost returns, and finds that part of her spirit has been reincarnated in the form of Chor-bat (Eason Chan).(n)

programme.title: Our Time Will Come
programme.desc: During the Japanese occupation of Hong Kong, Fan Lan is recruited to the anti-Japanese guerrilla for her intelligence. But when her mother takes her place and gets arrested, Fan is forced to turn to a friend who now works for the Japanese.(n)

programme.title: Paint My Love
programme.desc: Set in a small fishing village in Pulau Ketam, this coming-of-age story tells the struggles of a group of teenage friends faced with making the decision between chasing their dreams and doing what others want them to do.(n)

programme.title: Love Off The Cuff
programme.desc: Shawn Yue and Miriam Yeung reprise their popular roles as Jimmy and Cherie in this third installment of the romantic comedy. As the couple try to live happily ever after, the shocking news of Cherie's father marrying a girl younger than herself makes things complicated.(n)

programme.title: Daughter
programme.desc: Psychologist Sharon's (Kara Hui) only wish is for her daughter Jenny (Super Girls member Yanny Chan) to marry well. Despite Jenny's objections, Sharon sets her up with a rich suitor but things do not go as she planned; Jenny's actions become increasingly rebellious and strange.(n)

programme.title: Wild City
programme.desc: A cop-turned-bar-owner befriends a drunken woman at closing hours and finds himself pursued by her former lover and the thugs he employs. The chase turns deadly when the bar owner's deadbeat brother and a suitcase full of cash enter the picture.(n)

programme.title: With Prisoners
programme.desc: Fan is a young gang member sentenced to three months at a juvenile detention centre. He earns his right to be released in record time, only to witness the mysterious death of his cellmate days before his own release.(n)

programme.title: Paris Holiday
programme.desc: After his marriage proposal is rejected, a wine company executive flees to Paris, where broken hearts go to heal. He shares a flat with a psychopathic artist, who is also heartbroken from a break-up. Can the two of them let go of the past and find their soulmates in this beautiful, romantic city?(n)

programme.title: Let The Bullets Fly
programme.desc: Set in China during the 1920s, notorious bandit chief Zhang (Jiang Wen) descends upon a provincial town posing as its new mayor, an identity that he hijacked from the former mayor. Hell-bent on making a fast buck, Zhang soon meets his match in the tyrannical local gentry Wang (Chow Yun Fat).(n)

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: Produced by Johnnie To, this criminal thriller focuses on Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another, but are rumoured to be joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover.(n)

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: A Chinese wuxia fantasy film starring Louis Koo and Zhou Dongyu. A rare creature escapes from the western garden of the Imperial Palace. When the palace puts a hefty bounty on the escaped creature, martial arts masters from all walks of life jump in on the hunt.(n)

programme.title: Sky On Fire
programme.desc: The chief security officer at a top-secret medical facility finds himself caught in an explosive battle when a young thief steals a groundbreaking medicine. The officer must decide who he can trust to protect the cure from falling into the wrong hands.(n)

programme.title: The Greatest Lover
programme.desc: Three buffoons from the Chinese Mainland manage to enter Hong Kong illegally. As they are about to meet with a low-life islander who will provide them fake IDs, as was previously planned, one of the trio (Chow Yun-fat) gets lost and finds himself the student of an high-powered image maker.(n)

programme.title: Dragons Forever
programme.desc: In this action-comedy starring martial arts duo Jackie Chan and Sammo Hung, a lawyer (Jackie Chan) is hired by a chemical company of questionable ethics and must eventually make a difficult decision when his employer's motives become clear.(n)

programme.title: Project Gutenberg
programme.desc: The Hong Kong police hunt for a counterfeiting gang led by a mastermind known as Painter (Chow Yun Fat). In an effort to find Painter's real identity, the police recruits artist Lee Man (Aaron Kwok) to assist in solving the case.(n)

programme.title: The Crossing Part 1
programme.desc: On 27 January 1949, three couples boarded the steamer Taiping, together with over a thousand people including the rich, refugees and crew. What follows is a tragedy which claimed the lives of 1,500 people and the epic love stories left behind.(n)

programme.title: The Crossing Part 1
programme.desc: On 27 January 1949, three couples boarded the steamer Taiping, together with over a thousand people including the rich, refugees and crew. What follows is a tragedy which claimed the lives of 1,500 people and the epic love stories left behind.(n)

programme.title: My Alien Girlfriend
programme.desc: When Angela arrives from another planet in search of her brother, fate has her unexpectedly meet handsome veterinarian Tian Yi, who risks himself to save her every time she gets into trouble. Though she is no believer of love, his actions eventually move her.(n)

programme.title: Weeds On Fire
programme.desc: The Shatin Martins was the first Hong Kong youth baseball team set up in 1984. The 10 young players have uneasy and restless lives, but the hardship brings out their bravery, accumulating to their ultimate confrontation against their greatest rivals, the Japanese Buffaloes!(n)

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: Two hitmen, one a novice and the other a veteran with poor luck, band together to find the "King of Killers" for whom there is a large reward.(n)

programme.title: Deception Of The Novelist
programme.desc: A Hong Kong thriller adapted from the hit stories created by famous Internet author, Xxharuki. Xu is a successful author of self-help books. Together with his wife and their son, they lead a happy life. However, when a seductive tenant rents their apartment upstairs, Xu's life is turned upside down.(n)

programme.title: S For Sex S For Secret
programme.desc: S For Sex S For Secret is a comedy-drama about four people with drastically different views of sex. As a pair of newly-weds struggle with their marriage and sex life, an influential celebrity manager struggles to balance out her love for her husband with his sex addiction.(n)

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: In this Chinese action-thriller, Han Geng is a geek who encounters a pair of criminals in a video game and ends up going undercover for the police.(n)

programme.title: Killer Limo
programme.desc: Full of sword fights and action-packed sequences, this exciting crime-action movie is about a young woman who seeks revenge against criminal organisations that killed her father in Thailand.(n)

programme.title: EX
programme.desc: After a tiff, Yi ditches her toy boy and runs into her ex, Ping with his present girlfriend, Cee. Without a place to stay, Yi accepts their offer to crash at their new home. Old passions are ignited and Cee finds her patience stretched when it becomes clear Ping still has feelings for Yi.(n)

programme.title: A Chinese Odyssey Part Three
programme.desc: Sequel to the hit fantasy comedy franchise, A Chinese Odyssey is loosely based on Journey to the West, starring Tiffany Tang as Zixia, who travels back to the past in order to prevent the tragedy brought by the battle and the budding love between the Monkey King and her.(n)

programme.title: House Of Wolves
programme.desc: A Hong Kong comedy about two men - an imposter posing as an ALS patient and a devious bully - falling for the same pregnant woman.(n)

programme.title: Girl Of The Big House
programme.desc: Directed by Wong Jing, this family-friendly action comedy follows a little girl, born with a silver spoon, who is left alone at home and kidnapped by her uncle for their family heirloom.(n)

programme.title: Three ()
programme.desc: Directed by Johnnie To, this action-thriller tells the story of a cornered criminal who shoots himself to force the police to take him to the hospital, where he can wait for his cohorts to break him out.(n)

programme.title: Mission Milano
programme.desc: A wealthy entrepreneur (Huang Xiaoming) goes undercover with an Interpol agent (Andy Lau) to protect a new invention, the Seed of God, from falling into an international crime conglomerate.(n)

programme.title: Legend Of The Naga Pearls
programme.desc: A group of misfits team up to save humanity from creatures known as the Winged Tribe, who lost their power of flight centuries ago after their war against mankind. But now, they are hell-bent on seeking revenge by obtaining a mystical artifact called the Naga Pearls.(n)

programme.title: Legend Of The Naga Pearls
programme.desc: A group of misfits team up to save humanity from creatures known as the Winged Tribe, who lost their power of flight centuries ago after their war against mankind. But now, they are hell-bent on seeking revenge by obtaining a mystical artifact called the Naga Pearls.(n)

programme.title: I Sell Love
programme.desc: Tiffany begins compensated dating, a practice in which a young woman agrees to go on a date with a man for a fee or luxury gifts, and is content with her lifestyle until she meets a young man who changes her perspective.(n)

programme.title: Special Female Force
programme.desc: After her mother was killed in a mission 20 years ago in Thailand, Fa decides to join the police academy in Hong Kong were she meets five new friends. Failing to graduate, the six women are given the opportunity to hunt down terrorist Gu Zhi Jin, the man who killed Fa's mother.(n)

programme.title: The Last Supper
programme.desc: Yu (Daniel Wu) is a young noble. Commander of the era's most powerful army, he leads the revolt against the cruel Qin dynasty. Yu recognises potential in Liu (Liu Ye), a peasant, and gives him command of 5,000 soldiers, but Liu breaks an agreement with Yu by ransacking the Qin capital alone.(n)

programme.title: Funny Soccer
programme.desc: Far from its glory days, Victory Football Club is now facing bankruptcy and only the players who have problems are left behind. Despite the hardship, they try their best hoping to get through the football season and raise funds to avoid being dismissed.(n)

programme.title: Detective Gui
programme.desc: Gui (Wang Luodan) is a gifted but socially awkward detective whose extraordinary imagination and strong logical mind has helped her solve numerous cases in the past. One day, while investigating a murder case near her neighbourhood, her curiosity pushes her to discover shocking secrets.(n)

programme.title: Missbehavior
programme.desc: Missbehavior follows a group of friends, formerly close but now somewhat estranged, as they unite to help one of their own who is in trouble at work. In this hilarious comedy, the friends must find a replacement bottle of breast milk before the end of the day as chaos breaks out!(n)

programme.title: Lost In Wrestling
programme.desc: A young female Mongolian wrestler goes to Japan to find her long-lost mysterious friend, but is tricked into participating in a mud wrestling competition which she cannot quit.(n)

programme.title: The Kiss Addict
programme.desc: One night after a performance, young talented violinist Wen Feng receives a kiss from a mysterious woman, Duo La in Yalazhen. Following that it leads to his addiction to kissing. To find out the reason behind his mysterious new addiction, he goes back to Tibet in search of Duo La.(n)

programme.title: The Taking Of Tiger Mountain
programme.desc: A battle of wits and guts between a People's Liberation Army squad and a bandit gang during the Chinese Revolution. An epic action adventure film directed by Tsui Hark which became the 10th highest-grossing movie in China of all time!(n)

programme.title: Hotel Soul Good
programme.desc: Katie (Chrissie Chau) is a senior executive at a five-star hotel. One day, her best friend betrays her and steals her job and her boyfriend. To make things worse, Katie is hit by a meteor shower fragment and upon regaining consciousness, discovers that she can see three elderly ghosts.(n)

programme.title: Boxer From Shantung
programme.desc: Leaving the poverty of his life in Shantung to seek fortune in Shanghai, The Boxer is instead drawn into a world of corruption, gang warfare and evil, where his only protection is his famed fighting technique.(n)

programme.title: Insanity
programme.desc: Fan had a schizophrenic breakdown and murdered his wife. He was sentenced to a psychiatric facility under the care of Dr. Chow. After three years, the doctor believes that Fan is cured and discharges him. However, there is another killing and the prime suspect is Fan.(n)

programme.title: OlaBola
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s, an unlikely team of footballers with a streak of losses have one chance left for international glory. But with their personal issues and conflicts tearing the team apart, can they eventually come together to defeat the odds?(n)

programme.title: Anniversary
programme.desc: The sequel to Patrick Kong's 2006 romantic drama Marriage with a Fool, Alex Fong and Stephy Tang resume their roles as a married couple after a decade of marriage beset by temptation.(n)

programme.title: Anniversary
programme.desc: The sequel to Patrick Kong's 2006 romantic drama Marriage with a Fool, Alex Fong and Stephy Tang resume their roles as a married couple after a decade of marriage beset by temptation.(n)

programme.title: So, I Married My Anti-Fan
programme.desc: Female journalist Miaomiao Fang accidentally snaps a photo of the top Korean star Zhun Hou in a restroom of a night club and finds out about his dark personal life. Zhun tries to protect his image and forces Miaomiao's magazine to fire her.(n)

programme.title: Trap Street
programme.desc: A digital cartographer falls for a mysterious lady who works on an alley that doesn't exist on the map. A mainland China young love story with an unexpected turn.(n)

programme.title: Two Wrongs Make A Right
programme.desc: When fengshui master Ray (Vic Chou) forecasts his doom ahead, he sets out to find an ill-fated wretch to serve as the scapegoat of his mishaps. After meeting Pei Pei (Fiona Sit) and knowing that she is the person he is looking for, Ray purposefully woos her to keep her by his side.(n)

programme.title: Hello Mr. Billionaire
programme.desc: An incompetent soccer goalkeeper suddenly inherits 30 billion yuan. But in order to get the full amount, he must first spend one billion yuan on himself in a month without telling anyone about the task, and he is not allowed to own any assets at the end of it.(n)

programme.title: Love Contractually
programme.desc: Sammi Cheng stars as a no-nonsense CEO who has been betrayed by her two-timing fiancee and sets out to find a sperm donor so that she can have a child with no attachments in this romantic-comedy.(n)

programme.title: Let The Bullets Fly
programme.desc: Set in China during the 1920s, notorious bandit chief Zhang (Jiang Wen) descends upon a provincial town posing as its new mayor, an identity that he hijacked from the former mayor. Hell-bent on making a fast buck, Zhang soon meets his match in the tyrannical local gentry Wang (Chow Yun Fat).(n)

programme.title: New Blood
programme.desc: A young couple attempt to commit suicide, but only the girl dies. Her boyfriend is saved by a blood transfusion from the only three people with his rare blood type. Subsequently, each of the donors is haunted by the vengeful spirit of the dead girl.(n)

programme.title: Bewitched
programme.desc: A noble police detective starts investigating a child killer's claims of an evil spell.(n)

programme.title: Phantom Of The Theatre
programme.desc: This horror-drama takes place in Shanghai in the 1930s. Set in a haunted theatre, the vengeful spirits of a tragically-trapped performance troupe murdered in a fire 13 years ago wait for the once-grand palatial playhouse to re-open... and bring new victims.(n)

programme.title: The Fantastic Water Babes
programme.desc: Gil (Gillian Chung) is a vengeful girl who's just lost her boyfriend. Out of reckless anger, she joins the Fantastic Water Babes swimming competition against her romantic rival and her friends, even though she doesn't know how to swim.(n)

programme.title: Justice Sung Sai Kit
programme.desc: Tat Ming Cheung stars as the actor who portrayed the famous Justice Sung Sai Kit. When he encounters a mysterious woman, he is suddenly sent back in time to the Qing dynasty. There, he reprises his role as the Qing dynasty lawyer and sets out to protect the poor from the wealthy.(n)

programme.title: 夜宵磨[粵]
programme.desc: 身處「環球美食天堂」，夜宵當然也有國際化的菜式選擇。范振鋒、李思欣兩口子約陳思齊到尖沙咀某餐廳，吃盡不同國家的菜式。而周國賢亦愛吃澳門的花蛤蟹鍋，但原來不用「過大海」，留守佐敦亦能享用，所以找阿范及莊思敏一同品嚐。年輕人前往唱K，除了可一展歌喉之外，亦能品嚐美食，不知「巨聲2幫」吳業坤與謝東閔有沒有試過在80年代風行的餐廳酒廊內唱歌及用餐呢？欣欣決定帶這兩名年輕人見識，更伺機重拾當年的回憶。.(n)

programme.title: 談判官#18[粵/普]
programme.desc: 謝曉天找到了謝曉飛住的民宿，曉飛和童薇決定逃跑，就在緊要關頭，童薇接到了陳莫有意合作的電話，兩人立刻回國達成了談判。謝天成和謝曉天一起用餐，謝天成為曉天及其母親抱不平，並希望通過曉天的幫助讓謝氏易主。.(n)

programme.title: 帶班o靚仔去冒險[粵/英]
programme.desc: 每集都會帶同兩位青年旅行愛好者尋找世界各地不同景點及冒險旅程。.(n)

programme.title: 超人回來了[韓]
programme.desc: 洪爸爸為了羅媛清理儲物間，裝扮成屬於羅媛的房間。文爸爸帶著JamJam來到可欣賞美麗夜景的高架公園。Sam爸爸帶著WillBen復仇者聯盟出遊，吃野餐。朴爸爸帶著建娜可愛到可親自砍柴火，再用大型鐵板烤肉的烤肉店吃晚餐。.(n)

programme.title: 安樂蝸[粵]
programme.desc: 細單位採用黑白灰色調，容易造成壓迫感。設計師巧妙利用「留白」分隔不同空間，並以燈飾營造光線層次，打造出型格不壓迫的家居。兩房一廳格局大變身後，還可容納酒吧枱、L型梳化。新晉歌手施匡翹嚮往舒適空間，這次隨隊參觀的「夢想家」，是屋主夫婦互相遷就，合力設計的溫馨、簡單安樂窩。單位內裝飾、廚房地磚更隱藏主人家的珍貴回憶！和風家品店店主從日本搜羅特色家品、工匠製品，如何特別？另有主持測試迷你車用家用吸塵機。.(n)

programme.title: 無間音樂[粵]
programme.desc: 「Global Hot Picks」，主持胡蓓蔚和謝文欣搜羅多首外語歌MV，包括Meghan Trainor ft. Nicki Minaj、Ruel、The Chainsmokers & ILLENIUM ft. Lennon Stella、H.E.R.等。.(n)

programme.title: 我的非洲很有事[粵/普]
programme.desc: 本集是肯雅最終章，主持人把握在肯雅的最後時光，繼續探索肯雅的風土人情，包括品嘗讓人有戀愛感覺的漢堡包、到安博賽利國家公園觀賞野生動物及火山美景等，最後遊覽第二大城市蒙巴薩，了解當地悠久的歷史文化。.(n)

programme.title: #後生仔傾吓偈[粵][PG]
programme.desc: 後生仔2.0另外兩位KOL陳雪聰(蔥蔥)、徐文浩(Fred)加入，後者一開口便自認是馮盈盈的頭號擁躉，還即場近距離接觸對方，進行「體液交流」！今集討論聰明的懶人與勤力的蠢人誰較可取，KOSA傾向與愚笨的人共事，藉此顯得自己出色，增加升職機會；Tiffany則抗拒與蠢人合作，擔心被對方拖累。Danny喜歡勤力的女生，原因是可以要求對方獨力做家務；盈盈的男友是醫科高材生，為何在她的眼中卻是笨蛋？.(n)

programme.title: 出走地圖[粵/普]
programme.desc: 要深入了解帛琉之美，怎可錯過深潛體驗！韻潔、子芸報讀進階潛水課程，並分頭探索海底奧秘。子芸到德國水道一睹魔鬼魚風采，再往藍角和魚群會面。韻潔則尋找海龜身影，並細看被擊沉的二戰偵察機殘骸。二人還潛入海底鐘乳石洞探險，內裡竟別有洞天？走進傳統超市品嚐地道美食之後，主持們到訪海豚研究中心，跟可愛海豚近距離互動。她們亦會介紹兩個欣賞夕陽的好去處，海景餐廳主打鮮味融合菜；遊艇出海兼享用晚宴更是浪漫滿分！.(n)

programme.title: 失驚無神多個媽#31[粵/韓]
programme.desc: 孝燮去找熙京理論，卻得知恩秀不是城云的親生女兒；宥荷無意間聽說恩秀竟繼承了遺產，原來蔡家姐弟隱瞞了事實；善荷心疼折磨自己的景秀，忍不住說出真心；恩泰為幫助宥荷而召開理事會，燦九火冒三丈。.(n)

programme.title: 咖啡王子#9[粵/韓][PG]
programme.desc: 崔漢杰是一間咖啡店的新任經理，為了令這間咖啡店的業績起死回生，漢杰實行一個創新的方案，就是咖啡店的服務員全部都是年輕的美男子。為了幫補家計，高恩燦女扮男裝，混入這間咖啡店工作。.(n)

programme.title: 美麗魔法[粵/韓]
programme.desc: 本集介紹新主持人登場，充滿活力的女諧星朴娜萊加入主持群，為節目帶來全新氣象；本集主題是眼影，有金基修公開活用眼影的獨門秘訣及秀賢的八色眼影組合活用方法，並邀請到明星御用化妝師示範被冷落眼影的使用方法。.(n)

programme.title: 超人回來了[韓]
programme.desc: 洪爸爸為了羅媛清理儲物間，裝扮成屬於羅媛的房間。文爸爸帶著JamJam來到可欣賞美麗夜景的高架公園。Sam爸爸帶著WillBen復仇者聯盟出遊，吃野餐。朴爸爸帶著建娜可愛到可親自砍柴火，再用大型鐵板烤肉的烤肉店吃晚餐。.(n)

programme.title: 帶班o靚仔去冒險[粵/英]
programme.desc: 每集都會帶同兩位青年旅行愛好者尋找世界各地不同景點及冒險旅程。.(n)

programme.title: 談判官#19[粵/普]
programme.desc: 童薇為赴美參加謝氏慶功會準備，和杉杉逛街偶遇天宇和助手碧晨。曉天心疼母親在謝家受委屈。曉飛在公司會議上遲到，和謝天佑發生爭執。曉飛帶童薇參觀紐約，以及去醫院看他的母親。謝天佑希望童薇能勸誡曉飛。.(n)

programme.title: 法國潮什麼[粵]
programme.desc: 梁芷珮留守南特，參觀機械昆蟲藝術館，又與麥凱程走進波爾多酒莊測試運氣，結果幸運地抽中粉紅色酒塞，可在「酒桶」內住宿。波爾多有一間室內滑浪咖啡店，芷珮大方地把「騷身材」的機會留給凱程！巴黎是個吃喝購物的好地方，芷珮在日賣過千隻蝸牛的蝸牛餐廳細味獨一無二的黃金蝸牛後，乘鐵路前赴Bercy Village，於歷史悠久的餅店內享用牛角包、馬卡龍及咖啡，繼而到巴黎最有名足球隊的紀念品店，搜羅心頭好。.(n)

programme.title: 愛玩客之移動廚房[粵/普]
娛樂新聞報道
programme.desc: 每晚緊貼香港娛樂圈的消息，以至世界各地的影視娛樂新聞，報道藝人最新動態、劇集和電影宣傳、演唱會精華、頒獎禮盛況等，甚至遠赴外地採訪娛樂盛事、追蹤各地影星，專訪觀眾熟悉的歌、影、視紅人，讓大家瞬間掌握影視娛樂圈的動態和最新消息。.(n)

programme.title: 愛玩客之自遊神[粵/普]
programme.desc: 兩位主持會來一次自駕遊，在沒有導遊的幫助下，他們出發前往世界中心，從阿得萊德出發，先去奧古斯塔港住一晚，在海邊見到海豚，還在途中用前車蓋煮雞蛋來吃，去到Lake Hart欣賞美景，再到地下礦洞變成的酒店睡一晚.(n)

programme.title: 眼睛去旅行[粵]
programme.desc: 嚴崇天激玩韓國室內跳傘，體驗高空飛翔刺激快感，回看面容扭曲的片段，他更笑稱當時口沫橫飛！.(n)

programme.title: #後生仔傾吓偈[粵]
programme.desc: 講起旅行的中伏經歷，住宿必定榜上有名，臨時被取消預約、無熱水供應等不在話下。旅行隨時危機四伏，峰曾外遊英國撞正恐襲，尤幸最終有驚無險。嘉欣的沙漠之旅遇上沙塵暴，取消行程之餘還要替酒店修理熱水爐，何其掃興。Fred的友人忘記更換外遊電話卡，需繳付天價上網費，及後如何收科？芷欣與男友則曾因「為食」而送機尾！後生仔分享各自的旅行必備之物，盈盈怎麼又帶喇叭又帶耳塞？至於行李數量，男、女KOL可會大不同？.(n)

programme.title: 姊妹淘[粵]
programme.desc: 夜蒲派對妝着重於煙燻眼妝，而眉毛應以淺色為主，並可用眉刷描畫出自然感。「整妝待化」環節，化妝師畫上墨綠色上下眼線，再加上黑色、銀色眼影，從而放大眼睛。黏貼下假眼睫毛又有甚麼技巧？深色、棗紅色指甲油更可與煙燻眼妝互相配襯。星級教練曾淑雅亮相「我要全脂燃」，利用健身環示範五組普拉提動作。「抬頭式」可收緊二頭肌線條；高難度的「大腿後擺」則需運用全身肌力。她另提醒要因應力量、動作，選擇適當受力度的健身環。.(n)

programme.title: 失驚無神多個媽#32[粵/韓]
programme.desc: 蔡熙京想帶走恩秀去做基因測試，朴宥荷竟然主動配合。朴孝燮陪李美蓮去跟延燦九夫婦吃飯，席間延燦九出言侮辱朴宥荷，朴孝燮憤而離席，並與李美蓮吵架。車景秀和朴善荷復合，車母想與朴善荷打好關係，卻遭冷淡對待。.(n)

programme.title: 小滋女孩[粵/普]
programme.desc: 早起的鳥兒有蟲吃！蕭涵方、梁凱晴享用醒晨早餐，健康福祿壽飯團清新美味，並要由淡至濃味開動。此外，將台式羅勒三杯雞融合蛋餅，口感令人意想不到。蘇子芸發掘創意巨型三文治早餐，厚切挪威三文魚、藍莓豬排嫩蛋，鹹蛋黃月餅餡料竟可作早餐元素，驚喜連連！台式火鍋千變萬化，一人鍋亦可品嚐到爆炒滋味？浮誇一斤蜆鍋、麻辣蝦蝦鍋一鍋兩吃，多重味覺享受。涵方夜訪忘憂餐酒館，尋找佐酒一流的快樂料理，「厭世之人」的開胃解藥。.(n)

programme.title: 愛玩客之移動廚房[粵/普]
我的非洲很有事[粵/普]
programme.desc: 本集是肯雅最終章，主持人把握在肯雅的最後時光，繼續探索肯雅的風土人情，包括品嘗讓人有戀愛感覺的漢堡包、到安博賽利國家公園觀賞野生動物及火山美景等，最後遊覽第二大城市蒙巴薩，了解當地悠久的歷史文化。.(n)

programme.title: 愛玩客之移動廚房[粵/普]
談判官#19[粵/普]
programme.desc: 童薇為赴美參加謝氏慶功會準備，和杉杉逛街偶遇天宇和助手碧晨。曉天心疼母親在謝家受委屈。曉飛在公司會議上遲到，和謝天佑發生爭執。曉飛帶童薇參觀紐約，以及去醫院看他的母親。謝天佑希望童薇能勸誡曉飛。.(n)

programme.title: 姊姊妹妹動起來[粵]
programme.desc: 主持王子涵及莊思敏請來健身教練Rick Sidney教大家用Pilates Ring鍛鍊下半身。他講解利用Pilates Ring運動的好處、示範並提醒姊妹們做Above Knees、Supine Knees、Supine Ankles、Reserves Crunches、Single Leg Squeeze動作時需注意的事項，讓大家輕鬆練出下身好線條。嘉賓何佩珉、王若琪亦會分享運動習慣。.(n)

programme.title: 浪遊愛爾蘭[粵]
programme.desc: 陳智燊（Jason）首站帶大家走到距離機場半小時車程的都柏林（Dublin），一條著名的麗菲河將都柏林劃分為南北兩區，麗菲河上的半分橋，是為了紀念滑鐵盧戰役而興建，設計獨特且具歷史意義。Jason化身維京人登上外形像船的維京水陸兩用旅遊車，遊覽都柏林市內16個景點，經歷瘋狂之旅，大呼神奇好玩！結合藝術與科技的都柏林尖塔，Jason搞搞新意思，四處考問當地人尖塔的高度，竟然無人知曉？Jason又參與一年一度的啤酒節「歡樂Party」，品嚐地道啤酒、美食並盡情享受熱鬧氣氛！.(n)

programme.title: 叢林的法則[粵/韓]
programme.desc: 炳萬族親自製作椰子油，用釣到的小魚和蝦子炸出量少卻美味的晚餐充飢；隔天分成三隊，正式開始在第二個生存地－丹老群島的天堂進行生存，分別由老手正哲與女戰士寶凜領軍，一路勘查前往炳萬族長所在的生存地….(n)

programme.title: 法國潮什麼[粵]
programme.desc: 梁芷珮留守南特，參觀機械昆蟲藝術館，又與麥凱程走進波爾多酒莊測試運氣，結果幸運地抽中粉紅色酒塞，可在「酒桶」內住宿。波爾多有一間室內滑浪咖啡店，芷珮大方地把「騷身材」的機會留給凱程！巴黎是個吃喝購物的好地方，芷珮在日賣過千隻蝸牛的蝸牛餐廳細味獨一無二的黃金蝸牛後，乘鐵路前赴Bercy Village，於歷史悠久的餅店內享用牛角包、馬卡龍及咖啡，繼而到巴黎最有名足球隊的紀念品店，搜羅心頭好。.(n)

programme.title: 無間音樂[粵]
programme.desc: 周四「華語勁歌金榜」，主持谷婭溦、謝文欣送上本周冠軍歌－ J.Sheon ft. 艾怡良 & 馬仕釗。其餘十大位置MV，包括李千那、林俊傑、G.E.M.鄧紫棋、李榮浩、屁孩Ryan、A-Lin、麥亨利、周興哲、原子邦妮。.(n)

programme.title: 愛玩客之自遊神[粵/普]
programme.desc: 兩位主持會來一次自駕遊，在沒有導遊的幫助下，他們出發前往世界中心，從阿得萊德出發，先去奧古斯塔港住一晚，在海邊見到海豚，還在途中用前車蓋煮雞蛋來吃，去到Lake Hart欣賞美景，再到地下礦洞變成的酒店睡一晚.(n)

programme.title: #後生仔傾吓偈[粵]
programme.desc: 講起旅行的中伏經歷，住宿必定榜上有名，臨時被取消預約、無熱水供應等不在話下。旅行隨時危機四伏，峰曾外遊英國撞正恐襲，尤幸最終有驚無險。嘉欣的沙漠之旅遇上沙塵暴，取消行程之餘還要替酒店修理熱水爐，何其掃興。Fred的友人忘記更換外遊電話卡，需繳付天價上網費，及後如何收科？芷欣與男友則曾因「為食」而送機尾！後生仔分享各自的旅行必備之物，盈盈怎麼又帶喇叭又帶耳塞？至於行李數量，男、女KOL可會大不同？.(n)

programme.title: 姊妹淘[粵]
programme.desc: 夜蒲派對妝着重於煙燻眼妝，而眉毛應以淺色為主，並可用眉刷描畫出自然感。「整妝待化」環節，化妝師畫上墨綠色上下眼線，再加上黑色、銀色眼影，從而放大眼睛。黏貼下假眼睫毛又有甚麼技巧？深色、棗紅色指甲油更可與煙燻眼妝互相配襯。星級教練曾淑雅亮相「我要全脂燃」，利用健身環示範五組普拉提動作。「抬頭式」可收緊二頭肌線條；高難度的「大腿後擺」則需運用全身肌力。她另提醒要因應力量、動作，選擇適當受力度的健身環。.(n)

programme.title: 失驚無神多個媽#32[粵/韓]
programme.desc: 蔡熙京想帶走恩秀去做基因測試，朴宥荷竟然主動配合。朴孝燮陪李美蓮去跟延燦九夫婦吃飯，席間延燦九出言侮辱朴宥荷，朴孝燮憤而離席，並與李美蓮吵架。車景秀和朴善荷復合，車母想與朴善荷打好關係，卻遭冷淡對待。.(n)

programme.title: 咖啡王子#10[粵/韓][PG]
programme.desc: 崔漢杰是一間咖啡店的新任經理，為了令這間咖啡店的業績起死回生，漢杰實行一個創新的方案，就是咖啡店的服務員全部都是年輕的美男子。為了幫補家計，高恩燦女扮男裝，混入這間咖啡店工作。.(n)

programme.title: 大台冠軍[粵/日]
programme.desc: 充滿意欲和熱血的節目內，特定的競技範圍、深度的競技內容、通過出演本屆節目，改變自己的人生、創造新的時代.(n)

programme.title: 浪遊愛爾蘭[粵]
programme.desc: 陳智燊（Jason）首站帶大家走到距離機場半小時車程的都柏林（Dublin），一條著名的麗菲河將都柏林劃分為南北兩區，麗菲河上的半分橋，是為了紀念滑鐵盧戰役而興建，設計獨特且具歷史意義。Jason化身維京人登上外形像船的維京水陸兩用旅遊車，遊覽都柏林市內16個景點，經歷瘋狂之旅，大呼神奇好玩！結合藝術與科技的都柏林尖塔，Jason搞搞新意思，四處考問當地人尖塔的高度，竟然無人知曉？Jason又參與一年一度的啤酒節「歡樂Party」，品嚐地道啤酒、美食並盡情享受熱鬧氣氛！.(n)

programme.title: 叢林的法則[粵/韓]
programme.desc: 炳萬族親自製作椰子油，用釣到的小魚和蝦子炸出量少卻美味的晚餐充飢；隔天分成三隊，正式開始在第二個生存地－丹老群島的天堂進行生存，分別由老手正哲與女戰士寶凜領軍，一路勘查前往炳萬族長所在的生存地….(n)

programme.title: 玩創台灣[粵/普]
programme.desc: 文具品牌經典黃銅筆，筆身烤上黑漆，雕出金色線條，十分精緻；顧客可用古董凸版印刷機，壓出精緻信紙外框，再用蠟封印信封，展現品味。手工皮革商品店手工錶帶走軍事、復古風，還能找到意大利海軍扣環、瑞士軍人皮盒影子。餐廳只有一人餐桌！「手機布藥袋」、沙漏，鼓勵食客放下手機，細味菜式；廚師還會藉菜式與食客互動。得獎朱古力品牌採用法國技術，融合台灣食材，如屏東可可豆、雪莉桶威士忌、柴燒桂圓乾，創出驚喜味道。.(n)

programme.title: 談判官#20[粵/普]
programme.desc: 在謝氏的發布會上，正當謝天佑準備宣布謝氏和陳莫的合作時，突然被不請自來的謝天成打斷。謝曉天當眾宣布謝天成已成為謝氏的最大股東，謝天佑當場氣得暈倒。謝曉飛被趕出公寓，氣憤地去找曉天，卻反被奚落。.(n)

programme.title: 法國潮什麼[粵]
programme.desc: 梁芷珮走進牛油加工場，親睹師傅用人手搓牛油，而自己還嘗試把牛油弄成最多客人訂購的三角筒形狀。距離南特約一小時車程的波爾尼克小鎮，最有名的活動是租用釣魚屋釣魚，可憐芷珮最終空手而回，之後入住30多歐羅一晚的度假屋休息。麥凱程相約芷珮參加電單車葡萄酒團，到酒莊一嚐近期法國非常流行的有機葡萄酒，其後獨自帶觀眾光顧他讀大學時最愛的快餐店，重溫法式漢堡包的滋味。.(n)

programme.title: 愛玩客之移動廚房[粵/普]
娛樂新聞報道
programme.desc: 每晚緊貼香港娛樂圈的消息，以至世界各地的影視娛樂新聞，報道藝人最新動態、劇集和電影宣傳、演唱會精華、頒獎禮盛況等，甚至遠赴外地採訪娛樂盛事、追蹤各地影星，專訪觀眾熟悉的歌、影、視紅人，讓大家瞬間掌握影視娛樂圈的動態和最新消息。.(n)

programme.title: 旅人視角[粵/普]
programme.desc: 祐宏從宮廷設計的羅東車站出發，展開不一樣的宜蘭旅程。走訪七十年代美國古物店，一睹當年盛行的太空風格產品，更發現激罕飛機座椅、資薪機！把懷舊家具換上新裝，古老亦可變潮流。祐宏穿上浴衣在「小日本」庭園慢活，體驗手沖抹茶。他再遊覽梅花湖風景區，享用一客舒適愜意的湖景下午茶。祐宏來到射擊博物館，要慎防被空氣砲「爆頭」！館內亦有多項射擊設施，讓神射手玩過痛快。置身古堡模樣的親子民宿，觀迎探索神秘的魔法世界！.(n)

programme.title: 小滋女孩[粵/普]
programme.desc: 涵方、凱晴品嚐皇后級早餐及冰釀咖啡，享用美食之餘，還可窺見金魚暢游餐廳每個角落？凱晴到「室內大稻埕」朝聖！光顧以迪化街為主題的復古食肆，老派台灣菜一吃難忘；再喝一口新派雞尾酒，宵夜時段的最佳配搭。凱晴一身辣妹造型，帶涵方挑戰非一般的麻辣火鍋！豬腦、水蓮、黃喉、牛栢葉串配辣鍋，多重口感驚喜；不嗜辣的涵方，也可體驗配料十足的香濃酸菜白肉鍋。涵方走進人氣爆燈的永康街，發掘七彩特飲，精緻茶品則是手信佳選。.(n)

programme.title: #後生仔傾吓偈[粵]
programme.desc: 後生仔投選「驚恐王」！Sandy有一定演藝經驗，對每次拍攝仍感「騰雞」，獲高票數。誰知波波的驚恐更嚴重，竟害怕將錢存入銀行，只持現金，眾人詫異。Fred易被拍到面紅標冷汗，如何為驚青反應作辯解？驚恐或源自陰影，甚麼恐怖經歷令祖儀害怕窗戶？GM提到在公廁方便時不慎觸碰廁板的苦況，大有共鳴。當各人取笑波波連去廁所都驚時，始知她曾在廁格被偷拍，認真嚇到癲！祖儀、盈盈同訴年幼時曾被非禮，無奈太驚不敢反應！.(n)

programme.title: 姊妹淘[粵]
programme.desc: 「#熱搜人物」請來魔術師甄澤權，例牌動作，即場表演撲克魔術。若希、思敏看得目瞪口呆，再一次驚嘆被他的魔術迷倒！澤權憶述初次接觸魔術的微妙緣分，去年(2019)他榮獲香港傑出青年，更是史上首位魔術師得到這個榮譽。重提獲獎時的心情，澤權仍難掩激動。獲選傑青後，他有何推廣魔術的新目標？「姊點迷津」環節，有玄學家陳定幫為大家解開通勝迷思，何謂「小六壬」？幫幫帶來通勝卜卦的簡單教學，並細談占卜時的禁忌事項。.(n)

programme.title: 失驚無神多個媽#33[粵/韓]
programme.desc: 玄荷因為誤會踩了文植一腳, 後悔不已。宥荷向熙京宣戰，熙京得到恩秀不是城云女兒的證據，以為抓住了把柄，卻讓宥荷殺了個措手不及。多妍幫金代理送東西，不小心曝光自己的身分，她最在乎的還是在衡的反應。.(n)

programme.title: 出走地圖[粵/普]
programme.desc: 要深入了解帛琉之美，怎可錯過深潛體驗！韻潔、子芸報讀進階潛水課程，並分頭探索海底奧秘。子芸到德國水道一睹魔鬼魚風采，再往藍角和魚群會面。韻潔則尋找海龜身影，並細看被擊沉的二戰偵察機殘骸。二人還潛入海底鐘乳石洞探險，內裡竟別有洞天？走進傳統超市品嚐地道美食之後，主持們到訪海豚研究中心，跟可愛海豚近距離互動。她們亦會介紹兩個欣賞夕陽的好去處，海景餐廳主打鮮味融合菜；遊艇出海兼享用晚宴更是浪漫滿分！.(n)

programme.title: 愛玩客之移動廚房[粵/普]
#後生仔傾吓偈[粵]
programme.desc: 後生仔投選「驚恐王」！Sandy有一定演藝經驗，對每次拍攝仍感「騰雞」，獲高票數。誰知波波的驚恐更嚴重，竟害怕將錢存入銀行，只持現金，眾人詫異。Fred易被拍到面紅標冷汗，如何為驚青反應作辯解？驚恐或源自陰影，甚麼恐怖經歷令祖儀害怕窗戶？GM提到在公廁方便時不慎觸碰廁板的苦況，大有共鳴。當各人取笑波波連去廁所都驚時，始知她曾在廁格被偷拍，認真嚇到癲！祖儀、盈盈同訴年幼時曾被非禮，無奈太驚不敢反應！.(n)

programme.title: 咖啡王子#10[粵/韓][PG]
programme.desc: 崔漢杰是一間咖啡店的新任經理，為了令這間咖啡店的業績起死回生，漢杰實行一個創新的方案，就是咖啡店的服務員全部都是年輕的美男子。為了幫補家計，高恩燦女扮男裝，混入這間咖啡店工作。.(n)

programme.title: 旅人視角[粵/普]
programme.desc: 祐宏從宮廷設計的羅東車站出發，展開不一樣的宜蘭旅程。走訪七十年代美國古物店，一睹當年盛行的太空風格產品，更發現激罕飛機座椅、資薪機！把懷舊家具換上新裝，古老亦可變潮流。祐宏穿上浴衣在「小日本」庭園慢活，體驗手沖抹茶。他再遊覽梅花湖風景區，享用一客舒適愜意的湖景下午茶。祐宏來到射擊博物館，要慎防被空氣砲「爆頭」！館內亦有多項射擊設施，讓神射手玩過痛快。置身古堡模樣的親子民宿，觀迎探索神秘的魔法世界！.(n)

programme.title: 安樂蝸[粵]
programme.desc: 細單位採用黑白灰色調，容易造成壓迫感。設計師巧妙利用「留白」分隔不同空間，並以燈飾營造光線層次，打造出型格不壓迫的家居。兩房一廳格局大變身後，還可容納酒吧枱、L型梳化。新晉歌手施匡翹嚮往舒適空間，這次隨隊參觀的「夢想家」，是屋主夫婦互相遷就，合力設計的溫馨、簡單安樂窩。單位內裝飾、廚房地磚更隱藏主人家的珍貴回憶！和風家品店店主從日本搜羅特色家品、工匠製品，如何特別？另有主持測試迷你車用家用吸塵機。.(n)

programme.title: RUNNING MAN[粵/韓]
programme.desc: 今集請來國際大明星賴恩雷諾士、梅蘭妮蘿倫、安卓亞霍娜和演員黃寶羅與成員們進行競賽，當中隱藏著兩隻鬼，每回合輸隊都要在懲罰輪盤貼上名牌，若最後轉到懲罰格上有鬼的名字，鬼隊勝出，到底能找出誰是鬼嗎？.(n)

programme.title: 大台冠軍[粵/日]
programme.desc: 充滿意欲和熱血的節目內，特定的競技範圍、深度的競技內容、通過出演本屆節目，改變自己的人生、創造新的時代.(n)

programme.title: 不自然死因研究所#4[粵/日][PG]
programme.desc: 三澄美琴是專門探查死者死因的解剖醫生，她最不能容忍的是對“非自然死亡”不聞不問。然而，在日本，很多非自然死亡的死者都未經解剖就火化了。美琴與她那些個性鮮明的同事們一起，向這樣的現實發起了挑戰。.(n)

programme.title: 玩創台灣[粵/普]
programme.desc: 訂製西裝品牌純手製系列，細緻如鈕眼都以手工製成；另有網格紋西裝、傳統淨色雙排扣西裝、手工大褸，穿出品味。男士在落地玻璃加開揚景觀下，由專業按摩師按壓背部、頭皮，以及面部保養；享受英國精油，人生一樂也。餐廳設計採用英倫復古風，卻能品嚐亞洲風味。烤鴨胸採用宜蘭的櫻桃鴨炮製，原味、夾苦白苣、伴莓果醬三種食法，各有香味。酒店在升降機、餐廳、房間、櫃台，都滲入泡泡概念，住客化身泡泡，放鬆身心，排解憂慮。.(n)

programme.title: 世界第一等[粵/普]
programme.desc: 在系滿萬人綱開始之前，主持人前往遊覽沖繩青洞，並與當地人釣章魚，享受了一段悠閒時光之後，便要正式參與萬人綱的活動。這是一場全民參與的拔河賽，比的不是爆發力，而是耐力，到底這場比賽的結果會如何呢？.(n)

programme.title: 蒲夜市[粵]
programme.desc: 口感煙韌的豬血糕是台灣地道美食，內湖區的737巷還可找到巨大版本。刈包小食攤捨棄以豬肉作餡料的傳統做法，改配牛肉或雞肉，讓客人吃出新滋味。麵店主打古早味麵食粿仔條，小菜「剝骨鵝肉」亦是人氣熱選！Jumbo找到珍珠餡料的創新蔥油餅，味道怎樣？有甜品店的出品於網上總被搶購一空，在737巷的分店可即場選購，供應蛋糕、大福等士多啤梨甜品。今集還會介紹737巷內即包即蒸的小籠包，以及外層酥脆的營養三明治。.(n)

programme.title: 我的非洲很有事[粵/普]
programme.desc: 很有事團隊開始在馬達加斯加的旅程。他們到當地第二大城市穆隆達瓦，觀賞珍貴的猴麵包樹，更在猴麵包樹大道欣賞日落。然後前往鄰近漁村，了解當地漁民的生活，跟他們交流，最後還進入國家公園尋找狐猴的蹤跡。.(n)

programme.title: MIX[粵/日]
programme.desc: 30年前的夏天，明青學園高中靠著王牌投手上杉達也，首次打進甲子園，拿下冠軍，寫下輝煌記錄。此後再也沒有亮眼表現，直到立花兄弟，這對投捕兄弟檔的加入，棒球社似乎有望東山再起，然而打進甲子園的最大阻力，竟然是….(n)

programme.title: MIX[粵/日]
programme.desc: 30年前的夏天，明青學園高中靠著王牌投手上杉達也，首次打進甲子園，拿下冠軍，寫下輝煌記錄。此後再也沒有亮眼表現，直到立花兄弟，這對投捕兄弟檔的加入，棒球社似乎有望東山再起，然而打進甲子園的最大阻力，竟然是….(n)

programme.title: MASA滋味日常[粵/普]
programme.desc: 百年老店傳承着歷史記憶的味道。MASA老師閒逛台北剝皮寮老街、初嚐青草茶，還特地到訪百年肉圓老店；招牌美食「紅糟肉圓」、「滷肉飯」古早味飄香，不論食材、製法，皆充滿傳統特色。老師這次炮製一道簡易的日式傳統料理「筑前煮」。新鮮牛蒡是當中的靈魂食材，如何保留牛蒡表皮的營養？優質昆布應怎樣挑選？要為蒟蒻去除水分，又有甚麼方法？把牛蒡、蒟蒻、香菇炒香後，再放入雞腿肉熬煮成湯，即成煮物「福岡鄉土風筑前煮」！.(n)

programme.title: MASA滋味日常[粵/普]
programme.desc: 以酒入饌可提升食物的味道層次。MASA老師到訪以酒入菜的創意料理餐廳，「鴨胸芝麻葉沙拉」用蘋果酒輕解芝麻葉的微苦；「松露麻油雞燉飯」可謂米酒麻油雞高貴版；帶柑橘酒香的甜品「彩虹奶酪」，更是繽紛醉人。老師從中取得靈感，炮製一道「燉紅酒豬肉配香香奶油飯」。梅花豬肉片油花分佈適中，口感嫩滑。肉片以紅酒大火燉煮，配上加入牛油拌炒的香飯，西式佳餚透出亞洲風味。老師於進食時還為紅酒燉豬肉巧添鮮忌廉，奶香更濃！.(n)

programme.title: 煮將挑機[韓]
programme.desc: 韓國煮將們靠著李連福主廚全力應戰，延長賽中再下一城，拿下中韓戰第一戰的勝利，然而淺嚐勝利滋味之後，立即來到第二戰的對決地點R酒店，面對R酒店推出的夢幻隊伍，勝利女神會對哪一方露出微笑呢？.(n)

programme.title: 姊姊妹妹動起來[粵]
programme.desc: 嘉賓何雁詩、丁悅分享運動習慣。此外，不少人有「寒背」問題，導致走路姿態欠佳，長遠而言甚至會影響健康！健身教練Czon Wong表示都市人常用電腦及手機，令身體容易向前傾，她教大家利用一支長木棍做運動，伸展及增加肩關節和肌肉的靈活性，改善體態問題。.(n)

programme.title: C AllStar泰空曼遊[粵]
programme.desc: Jase帶On仔到街邊品嚐地道「粉絲蟹煲」，轉眼會合King和釗峰，一起享用新派泰菜，還化身「情聖」，高談應對女友的心得。精力充沛的四人戴上拳套，接受美女泰拳教練的地獄式訓練，挑戰減磅任務，結果如何？揮灑汗水過後，四子大歎傳統泰式按摩緩解疲累；閒逛著名市集搜羅夏日裝束，還走進有小日本之稱的年輕人熱點，分享文青態度。四子及後踏足泰國音樂大學，跟校內師生切磋交流，並細說昔日街頭演唱點滴與各自夢想。.(n)

programme.title: 玩創台灣[粵/普]
programme.desc: 訂製西裝品牌純手製系列，細緻如鈕眼都以手工製成；另有網格紋西裝、傳統淨色雙排扣西裝、手工大褸，穿出品味。男士在落地玻璃加開揚景觀下，由專業按摩師按壓背部、頭皮，以及面部保養；享受英國精油，人生一樂也。餐廳設計採用英倫復古風，卻能品嚐亞洲風味。烤鴨胸採用宜蘭的櫻桃鴨炮製，原味、夾苦白苣、伴莓果醬三種食法，各有香味。酒店在升降機、餐廳、房間、櫃台，都滲入泡泡概念，住客化身泡泡，放鬆身心，排解憂慮。.(n)

programme.title: 小明星大跟班[普]
programme.desc: 台灣綜藝天王吳宗憲與女兒吳姍儒聯手主持，首次搭檔主持激盪出臺灣影視圈兩代關係大突破！.(n)

programme.title: 寵物大本營[粵/日]
programme.desc: 本節目講述藝人松本秀樹人與狗狗主人公“大介”在日本各地縱橫旅行時所遇到的當地各類寵物、當地的各型各色的民眾以及各地的景點和自然風貌，在他們所到之處都會受到當地民眾的熱烈歡迎！.(n)

programme.title: 台北101種玩法[粵]
programme.desc: 要玩轉台北，當然從101大樓開始！主持余德丞坐高速升降機登上89樓，360度飽覽市內景色，還在集愛之牆許願。拍檔譚凱螢則勇闖101頂樓，在雲霧中刺激漫步。征服過台灣第一高樓後，凱螢化身飛機師！全台唯一純手工打造的飛行模擬器，讓她一嘗駕駛飛機的樂趣。台灣必吃麻辣火鍋、熱炒，德丞光顧的餐廳可一次滿足兩個願望，CP值有多高？凱螢走進「型男」居酒屋，品嚐生牛肉等料理，再到二、三樓酒吧區，盡情飲酒、打卡。.(n)

programme.title: 叢林的法則[粵/韓]
programme.desc: 本集為中秋特輯，炳萬族在茵達族受到熱情款待，為了報答他們，炳萬族長帶領族人為漁夫一家修繕年久失修的房屋，Sean則準備禮物分送給村落的孩子；東炫隊則與緬甸的大象一同享受沖涼趣，培養感情並體驗文化….(n)

programme.title: 眼睛去旅行[粵]
programme.desc: 節目由不同藝人或旅遊達人帶觀眾到世界各地，介紹當地新奇好玩之處。先有姜麗文在新宿穿上浴衣參加夏祭，喪食地道小食，觀賞傳統舞蹈表演，全情投入祭典。.(n)

programme.title: 中學聖日記#7[粵/日][PG]
programme.desc: 在對聖仍念念不忘的狀態下，晶與月之間展開了交往關係。聖在小鎮中擔任小學教師的傳聞漸漸擴散開去，但只有晶被蒙在鼓中。某天，晶接到了一通來自中學同學的電話，得知聖的所在之處後立刻把一切拋在後頭飛奔而去….(n)

programme.title: #溫哥華後生仔傾吓偈[粵][PG]
programme.desc: 後生仔都曾被家規「約束」過，B Chiu家有換拖鞋的習慣，拖鞋還有「區域限制」？祖儀中學時如未能天黑前回家，即被罰抄！Sandy家一直有跟屋企人過生日的習慣，拍拖時怎麼辦？又看看Ethan圖解其媽媽的苦心叮囑。後生仔可曾帶異性返家？Brian試過帶女生回家過夜，大家都好奇二人期間怎樣打發時間。犯家規可以好大件事，Ethan曾對長輩無禮貌被重罰，更因沉迷打機被父母送進精神病院，最終如何收科？.(n)

programme.title: FAIRY TAIL魔導少年 VI[粵/日][PG]
programme.desc: 於大魔鬥演武中奪冠後的妖精尾巴，其公會的委託量因而大增。有一天，一份指定納茲及格雷的緊急委託書突然地送到了妖精尾巴。而這份工作竟是來自聖十大魔導排行第四、伊修迦爾四天王之一沃洛德‧辛肯的委託…….(n)

programme.title: 台灣潮點圖鑑[粵/普]
programme.desc: KOL港妹AV走訪藏身於百貨公司的街市，有機菜、特色水果，應有盡有。.(n)

programme.title: 台北101種玩法[粵]
programme.desc: 要玩轉台北，當然從101大樓開始！主持余德丞坐高速升降機登上89樓，360度飽覽市內景色，還在集愛之牆許願。拍檔譚凱螢則勇闖101頂樓，在雲霧中刺激漫步。征服過台灣第一高樓後，凱螢化身飛機師！全台唯一純手工打造的飛行模擬器，讓她一嘗駕駛飛機的樂趣。台灣必吃麻辣火鍋、熱炒，德丞光顧的餐廳可一次滿足兩個願望，CP值有多高？凱螢走進「型男」居酒屋，品嚐生牛肉等料理，再到二、三樓酒吧區，盡情飲酒、打卡。.(n)

programme.title: 中學聖日記#7[粵/日][PG]
programme.desc: 在對聖仍念念不忘的狀態下，晶與月之間展開了交往關係。聖在小鎮中擔任小學教師的傳聞漸漸擴散開去，但只有晶被蒙在鼓中。某天，晶接到了一通來自中學同學的電話，得知聖的所在之處後立刻把一切拋在後頭飛奔而去….(n)

programme.title: #溫哥華後生仔傾吓偈[粵][PG]
programme.desc: 後生仔都曾被家規「約束」過，B Chiu家有換拖鞋的習慣，拖鞋還有「區域限制」？祖儀中學時如未能天黑前回家，即被罰抄！Sandy家一直有跟屋企人過生日的習慣，拍拖時怎麼辦？又看看Ethan圖解其媽媽的苦心叮囑。後生仔可曾帶異性返家？Brian試過帶女生回家過夜，大家都好奇二人期間怎樣打發時間。犯家規可以好大件事，Ethan曾對長輩無禮貌被重罰，更因沉迷打機被父母送進精神病院，最終如何收科？.(n)

programme.desc: 於大魔鬥演武中奪冠後的妖精尾巴，其公會的委託量因而大增。有一天，一份指定納茲及格雷的緊急委託書突然地送到了妖精尾巴。而這份工作竟是來自聖十大魔導排行第四、伊修迦爾四天王之一沃洛德‧辛肯的委託…….(n)

programme.title: 小滋女孩[粵/普]
programme.desc: 涵方、凱晴品嚐皇后級早餐及冰釀咖啡，享用美食之餘，還可窺見金魚暢游餐廳每個角落？凱晴到「室內大稻埕」朝聖！光顧以迪化街為主題的復古食肆，老派台灣菜一吃難忘；再喝一口新派雞尾酒，宵夜時段的最佳配搭。凱晴一身辣妹造型，帶涵方挑戰非一般的麻辣火鍋！豬腦、水蓮、黃喉、牛栢葉串配辣鍋，多重口感驚喜；不嗜辣的涵方，也可體驗配料十足的香濃酸菜白肉鍋。涵方走進人氣爆燈的永康街，發掘七彩特飲，精緻茶品則是手信佳選。.(n)

programme.title: 台北101種玩法[粵]
programme.desc: 要玩轉台北，當然從101大樓開始！主持余德丞坐高速升降機登上89樓，360度飽覽市內景色，還在集愛之牆許願。拍檔譚凱螢則勇闖101頂樓，在雲霧中刺激漫步。征服過台灣第一高樓後，凱螢化身飛機師！全台唯一純手工打造的飛行模擬器，讓她一嘗駕駛飛機的樂趣。台灣必吃麻辣火鍋、熱炒，德丞光顧的餐廳可一次滿足兩個願望，CP值有多高？凱螢走進「型男」居酒屋，品嚐生牛肉等料理，再到二、三樓酒吧區，盡情飲酒、打卡。.(n)

programme.title: 大台冠軍[粵/日]
programme.desc: 充滿意欲和熱血的節目內，特定的競技範圍、深度的競技內容、通過出演本屆節目，改變自己的人生、創造新的時代.(n)

programme.title: 不自然死因研究所#5[粵/日][PG]
programme.desc: 三澄美琴是專門探查死者死因的解剖醫生，她最不能容忍的是對“非自然死亡”不聞不問。然而，在日本，很多非自然死亡的死者都未經解剖就火化了。美琴與她那些個性鮮明的同事們一起，向這樣的現實發起了挑戰。.(n)

programme.title: 玩創台灣[粵/普]
programme.desc: 酒吧創辦人將台灣文化融入西式調酒，特別採用台灣烏龍茶、綠茶、紅茶製作餐酒，配搭淡味至濃味菜式。阿姆斯特丹傳入的潮流酒店，房間以平板電腦操作，住客可自行調較浴室情景燈，難以抗拒的時尚感；還有個即食麵吧，年輕人至愛！意大利品牌運用回收或再生材料，如烏木、癒創木等製作手錶、太陽眼鏡、領呔、煲呔等。歐洲美食嘉年華食勻歐洲小食，除荷蘭煎餅、牛角酥杯子蛋糕，還有重頭戲德國啤酒節，別錯過品嚐德國香腸、豬腳。.(n)

programme.title: 世界第一等[粵/普]
programme.desc: 本集主持人會在沖繩體驗在馬路上駕駛小型賽車，隨後品嘗被當地人視為珍寶的超級食物補充養分。而作為空手道的發源地，主持人更會向國寶級大師拜師學藝，再好好把握機會，在擁有多元豐富海洋生態的沖繩挑戰海中巨物。.(n)

programme.title: 這一站阿拉伯[粵]
programme.desc: 阿曼的漁業發達，凱晴逛港口旁的魚市場，攤檔擺放着林林總總的海產，更有售魔鬼魚！市場內乾淨企理，連賣魚方式都與別不同。到鄰近的餐廳品嚐即烤海鮮，新鮮惹味！雖然中東地區的餐廳以印度餐廳為主，但除了咖喱、印度薄餅外，亦有上海炒麵、水果Cocktail等。當地人飯後會怎樣清新口腔？凱晴又到博物館了解阿曼的航海、武器知識，還一睹皇家歌劇院的阿曼建築工藝特色。愛情街是時尚聚集地，不妨了解一下中東傳統服飾！.(n)

programme.title: 玩創台灣[粵/普]
programme.desc: 酒吧創辦人將台灣文化融入西式調酒，特別採用台灣烏龍茶、綠茶、紅茶製作餐酒，配搭淡味至濃味菜式。阿姆斯特丹傳入的潮流酒店，房間以平板電腦操作，住客可自行調較浴室情景燈，難以抗拒的時尚感；還有個即食麵吧，年輕人至愛！意大利品牌運用回收或再生材料，如烏木、癒創木等製作手錶、太陽眼鏡、領呔、煲呔等。歐洲美食嘉年華食勻歐洲小食，除荷蘭煎餅、牛角酥杯子蛋糕，還有重頭戲德國啤酒節，別錯過品嚐德國香腸、豬腳。.(n)

programme.title: 帶班o靚仔去冒險[粵/英]
programme.desc: 每集都會帶同兩位青年旅行愛好者尋找世界各地不同景點及冒險旅程。.(n)

programme.title: 超人回來了[韓]
programme.desc: 羅媛用獨自去超市買來的材料與洪爸爸一同做料理。文爸爸帶著JamJam來到KBS電視台看有名的貓咪，偶遇SEVENTEEN偶像組合一同進餐。Sam一家來到澳洲墨爾本Nana家，度過快樂萬聖節。朴爸爸帶著建娜可愛來到艮绝岬遊玩。.(n)

programme.title: 安樂蝸[粵]
programme.desc: 囝囝逐漸長大，屋主夫婦將十年居所重新裝潢，打造舒適空間。浴缸改建為日式風呂，可增進親子時光；坐鎮客廳的影音組合，男人的浪漫！藝人鄧智堅參觀後，最愛哪個部份？日式設計崇尚簡約自然，着重設計者的精神。曾在日本修讀室內設計的林華明細說和式設計精髓，以及難忘工作體驗。摺疊乾衣機方便收納，乾衣效能又怎樣？留意「妄購SOL」。中式小擺設能為平凡家居添上藝術氣息，主持們到訪中式家品店，搜羅多款獨特又實用的珍藏。.(n)

programme.title: RUNNING MAN[粵/韓]
programme.desc: 今集是送舊迎新特輯，邀請了嘉賓全烋星、Yoyomi、姜泰伍和許卿煥與成員們一起進行競賽，電影節中隱藏兩名導演與一名國民演員，要找出導演並將其淘汰，演員隊才會勝出，到底他們能成功嗎？.(n)

programme.title: 初戀那一天所讀的故事#6[粵/日]
programme.desc: 匡平、雅志與山下之間的競爭意識越趨激烈，為了得到順子的心，三人皆以自己的形式、自己的做法努力不懈。這時候，意識到自身能力不足的順子，為求讓匡平成功考上東大，而私下與其父親會面商量一項重大決定….(n)

programme.title: FAIRY TAIL魔導少年 VI[粵/日][PG]
programme.desc: 於大魔鬥演武中奪冠後的妖精尾巴，其公會的委託量因而大增。有一天，一份指定納茲及格雷的緊急委託書突然地送到了妖精尾巴。而這份工作竟是來自聖十大魔導排行第四、伊修迦爾四天王之一沃洛德‧辛肯的委託…….(n)

programme.title: 台灣潮點圖鑑[粵/普]
programme.desc: 蕭新亭介紹台北迪化街一間結合洗衣店與咖啡廳的非一般民宿，洗衣服時可到一樓的咖啡廳品嚐甜點或輕食，享受悠閒時光。二樓與三樓則是民宿的客房區，提供開放式的共用客廳，環境明亮舒適。.(n)

programme.title: 安樂蝸[粵]
programme.desc: 囝囝逐漸長大，屋主夫婦將十年居所重新裝潢，打造舒適空間。浴缸改建為日式風呂，可增進親子時光；坐鎮客廳的影音組合，男人的浪漫！藝人鄧智堅參觀後，最愛哪個部份？日式設計崇尚簡約自然，着重設計者的精神。曾在日本修讀室內設計的林華明細說和式設計精髓，以及難忘工作體驗。摺疊乾衣機方便收納，乾衣效能又怎樣？留意「妄購SOL」。中式小擺設能為平凡家居添上藝術氣息，主持們到訪中式家品店，搜羅多款獨特又實用的珍藏。.(n)

programme.title: 初戀那一天所讀的故事#6[粵/日]
programme.desc: 匡平、雅志與山下之間的競爭意識越趨激烈，為了得到順子的心，三人皆以自己的形式、自己的做法努力不懈。這時候，意識到自身能力不足的順子，為求讓匡平成功考上東大，而私下與其父親會面商量一項重大決定….(n)

programme.title: C AllStar泰空曼遊[粵]
programme.desc: Jase帶On仔到街邊品嚐地道「粉絲蟹煲」，轉眼會合King和釗峰，一起享用新派泰菜，還化身「情聖」，高談應對女友的心得。精力充沛的四人戴上拳套，接受美女泰拳教練的地獄式訓練，挑戰減磅任務，結果如何？揮灑汗水過後，四子大歎傳統泰式按摩緩解疲累；閒逛著名市集搜羅夏日裝束，還走進有小日本之稱的年輕人熱點，分享文青態度。四子及後踏足泰國音樂大學，跟校內師生切磋交流，並細說昔日街頭演唱點滴與各自夢想。.(n)

programme.title: 這一站阿拉伯[粵]
programme.desc: 阿曼的漁業發達，凱晴逛港口旁的魚市場，攤檔擺放着林林總總的海產，更有售魔鬼魚！市場內乾淨企理，連賣魚方式都與別不同。到鄰近的餐廳品嚐即烤海鮮，新鮮惹味！雖然中東地區的餐廳以印度餐廳為主，但除了咖喱、印度薄餅外，亦有上海炒麵、水果Cocktail等。當地人飯後會怎樣清新口腔？凱晴又到博物館了解阿曼的航海、武器知識，還一睹皇家歌劇院的阿曼建築工藝特色。愛情街是時尚聚集地，不妨了解一下中東傳統服飾！.(n)

programme.title: FAIRY TAIL魔導少年 VI[粵/日][PG]
programme.desc: 於大魔鬥演武中奪冠後的妖精尾巴，其公會的委託量因而大增。有一天，一份指定納茲及格雷的緊急委託書突然地送到了妖精尾巴。而這份工作竟是來自聖十大魔導排行第四、伊修迦爾四天王之一沃洛德‧辛肯的委託…….(n)

programme.title: 愛玩客之移動廚房[粵/普]
談判官#20[粵/普]
programme.desc: 在謝氏的發布會上，正當謝天佑準備宣布謝氏和陳莫的合作時，突然被不請自來的謝天成打斷。謝曉天當眾宣布謝天成已成為謝氏的最大股東，謝天佑當場氣得暈倒。謝曉飛被趕出公寓，氣憤地去找曉天，卻反被奚落。.(n)

programme.title: 姊姊妹妹動起來[粵]
programme.desc: 近年越來越多人學泰拳瘦身，「姊姊妹妹動起來」請來范文雅、李豪作嘉賓；而世界級拳王、泰拳教練Bryan To，會教大家一些簡單泰拳動作。Bryan會解釋泰拳又稱八臂拳的原因，並會傳授連續左右直拳、左右膝撞、左右肘擊、擋腳、掃踢的動作，以及提醒當中的注意事項。.(n)

programme.title: RUNNING MAN[粵/韓]
programme.desc: 今集是送舊迎新特輯，邀請了嘉賓全烋星、Yoyomi、姜泰伍和許卿煥與成員們一起進行競賽，電影節中隱藏兩名導演與一名國民演員，要找出導演並將其淘汰，演員隊才會勝出，到底他們能成功嗎？.(n)

programme.title: 法國潮什麼[粵]
programme.desc: 梁芷珮走進牛油加工場，親睹師傅用人手搓牛油，而自己還嘗試把牛油弄成最多客人訂購的三角筒形狀。距離南特約一小時車程的波爾尼克小鎮，最有名的活動是租用釣魚屋釣魚，可憐芷珮最終空手而回，之後入住30多歐羅一晚的度假屋休息。麥凱程相約芷珮參加電單車葡萄酒團，到酒莊一嚐近期法國非常流行的有機葡萄酒，其後獨自帶觀眾光顧他讀大學時最愛的快餐店，重溫法式漢堡包的滋味。.(n)

programme.title: 樂勢力[粵][PG]
programme.desc: 谷婭溦認為自家歌是其寫照，並細說隻身來港發展時不懂廣東話，要感謝吳若希教她咬筷子讀報練習。MV找來#後生仔Tiffany任女主角，希望帶出不放棄的堅毅精神。徐加晴以抒發對新型肺炎疫情的感受，製作全程竟亦巧合是十四天。她訴說作曲期間曾痛哭，所為何事？十六歲新人張若希帶來，並分享要成為創作歌手的夢想。嘉賓們還暢談難忘演出經歷，婭溦曾因緊張而在台上倒轉咪高峰？.(n)

programme.title: 旅人視角[粵/普]
programme.desc: 祐宏從宮廷設計的羅東車站出發，展開不一樣的宜蘭旅程。走訪七十年代美國古物店，一睹當年盛行的太空風格產品，更發現激罕飛機座椅、資薪機！把懷舊家具換上新裝，古老亦可變潮流。祐宏穿上浴衣在「小日本」庭園慢活，體驗手沖抹茶。他再遊覽梅花湖風景區，享用一客舒適愜意的湖景下午茶。祐宏來到射擊博物館，要慎防被空氣砲「爆頭」！館內亦有多項射擊設施，讓神射手玩過痛快。置身古堡模樣的親子民宿，觀迎探索神秘的魔法世界！.(n)

programme.title: 小滋女孩[粵/普]
programme.desc: 涵方、凱晴品嚐皇后級早餐及冰釀咖啡，享用美食之餘，還可窺見金魚暢游餐廳每個角落？凱晴到「室內大稻埕」朝聖！光顧以迪化街為主題的復古食肆，老派台灣菜一吃難忘；再喝一口新派雞尾酒，宵夜時段的最佳配搭。凱晴一身辣妹造型，帶涵方挑戰非一般的麻辣火鍋！豬腦、水蓮、黃喉、牛栢葉串配辣鍋，多重口感驚喜；不嗜辣的涵方，也可體驗配料十足的香濃酸菜白肉鍋。涵方走進人氣爆燈的永康街，發掘七彩特飲，精緻茶品則是手信佳選。.(n)

programme.title: #後生仔傾吓偈[粵]
programme.desc: 後生仔投選「驚恐王」！Sandy有一定演藝經驗，對每次拍攝仍感「騰雞」，獲高票數。誰知波波的驚恐更嚴重，竟害怕將錢存入銀行，只持現金，眾人詫異。Fred易被拍到面紅標冷汗，如何為驚青反應作辯解？驚恐或源自陰影，甚麼恐怖經歷令祖儀害怕窗戶？GM提到在公廁方便時不慎觸碰廁板的苦況，大有共鳴。當各人取笑波波連去廁所都驚時，始知她曾在廁格被偷拍，認真嚇到癲！祖儀、盈盈同訴年幼時曾被非禮，無奈太驚不敢反應！.(n)

programme.title: 姊妹淘[粵]
programme.desc: 「#熱搜人物」請來魔術師甄澤權，例牌動作，即場表演撲克魔術。若希、思敏看得目瞪口呆，再一次驚嘆被他的魔術迷倒！澤權憶述初次接觸魔術的微妙緣分，去年(2019)他榮獲香港傑出青年，更是史上首位魔術師得到這個榮譽。重提獲獎時的心情，澤權仍難掩激動。獲選傑青後，他有何推廣魔術的新目標？「姊點迷津」環節，有玄學家陳定幫為大家解開通勝迷思，何謂「小六壬」？幫幫帶來通勝卜卦的簡單教學，並細談占卜時的禁忌事項。.(n)

programme.title: 失驚無神多個媽#33[粵/韓]
programme.desc: 玄荷因為誤會踩了文植一腳, 後悔不已。宥荷向熙京宣戰，熙京得到恩秀不是城云女兒的證據，以為抓住了把柄，卻讓宥荷殺了個措手不及。多妍幫金代理送東西，不小心曝光自己的身分，她最在乎的還是在衡的反應。.(n)

programme.title: 咖啡王子#11[粵/韓][PG]
programme.desc: 崔漢杰是一間咖啡店的新任經理，為了令這間咖啡店的業績起死回生，漢杰實行一個創新的方案，就是咖啡店的服務員全部都是年輕的美男子。為了幫補家計，高恩燦女扮男裝，混入這間咖啡店工作。.(n)

programme.title: 世界第一等[粵/普]
programme.desc: 在系滿萬人綱開始之前，主持人前往遊覽沖繩青洞，並與當地人釣章魚，享受了一段悠閒時光之後，便要正式參與萬人綱的活動。這是一場全民參與的拔河賽，比的不是爆發力，而是耐力，到底這場比賽的結果會如何呢？.(n)

programme.title: RUNNING MAN[粵/韓]
programme.desc: 今集是送舊迎新特輯，邀請了嘉賓全烋星、Yoyomi、姜泰伍和許卿煥與成員們一起進行競賽，電影節中隱藏兩名導演與一名國民演員，要找出導演並將其淘汰，演員隊才會勝出，到底他們能成功嗎？.(n)

programme.title: 姊姊妹妹動起來[粵]
programme.desc: 近年越來越多人學泰拳瘦身，「姊姊妹妹動起來」請來范文雅、李豪作嘉賓；而世界級拳王、泰拳教練Bryan To，會教大家一些簡單泰拳動作。Bryan會解釋泰拳又稱八臂拳的原因，並會傳授連續左右直拳、左右膝撞、左右肘擊、擋腳、掃踢的動作，以及提醒當中的注意事項。.(n)

programme.title: 談判官#21[粵/普]
programme.desc: 在餐廳裡，謝嬸羞辱謝曉飛，童薇替謝曉飛出頭把謝嬸給氣走了。謝曉飛聽從童薇勸說去探望父親，父親的一番話讓他下定決心要奪回謝氏，重振家聲。趙晨曦得知謝氏易主後，拉攏秦天宇聯手拆散謝曉飛和童薇。.(n)

programme.title: 法國潮什麼[粵]
programme.desc: 梁芷珮接觸法國當地的文化，先跟戲劇大師學習簡單的默劇動作，然後光顧巴黎最古舊的餐廳，細味最地道的洋蔥湯、鴨胸及焦糖燉蛋，再到二手市場尋寶。從巴黎市中心坐約兩小時火車就可到達的南特，是法國有名的藝術城市，藝術品可謂隨處可見。芷珮走到旅客資訊中心，沿著地上的綠線走，遊覽不同的旅遊景點。她參觀了1801年已創立的藝術博物館，在總統也曾光顧的咖啡店流連，還到有約80年歷史的法式薄餅店做學徒。.(n)

programme.title: 愛玩客之移動廚房[粵/普]
娛樂新聞報道
programme.desc: 每晚緊貼香港娛樂圈的消息，以至世界各地的影視娛樂新聞，報道藝人最新動態、劇集和電影宣傳、演唱會精華、頒獎禮盛況等，甚至遠赴外地採訪娛樂盛事、追蹤各地影星，專訪觀眾熟悉的歌、影、視紅人，讓大家瞬間掌握影視娛樂圈的動態和最新消息。.(n)

programme.title: 這一站阿拉伯[粵]
programme.desc: 凱晴在阿曼古建築風格餐廳品嚐傳統早餐，各式配菜加烤餅，怎樣才是阿拉伯人的正宗食法？凱晴更發現中東都有「滷肉飯」、「炒米粉」？置身石油國度，到石油博物館探個究竟，從互動裝置認識鑽油工序，亦可深入了解中東的環保能源發展。再逛逛當地的超市，吸引凱晴的莫過於抵食甜點，凱晴亦一試超市的日用品外送服務。凱晴拜訪當地家庭，與當地人圍坐地上用餐，中東人有甚麼用餐禮儀？屋主更熱情款待凱晴參觀其超大自家農場！.(n)

programme.title: 蒲夜市[粵]
programme.desc: 「蒲夜市」是大多數香港人前赴台灣旅遊的指定動作，而不少當地人亦在夜市吃晚飯和宵夜，可見台灣夜市的美食滋味無窮。除了港人熟悉的士林夜市與饒河街觀光夜市之外，其實台北還有多個深受市內民眾歡迎的夜市。美女主持曾淑雅(Jumbo)會為觀眾精選台北十大夜市的必吃美食清單，如供應蚵仔煎、珍珠奶茶等人氣商戶。想知道最滋味、最地道的台北夜市攻略，大家就要跟隨Jumbo《蒲夜市》！.(n)

programme.title: #後生仔傾吓偈[粵]
programme.desc: 年輕人近年善用網絡的影響力改變世界，實現各種瘋狂念頭。陸浩明、麥明詩、馮盈盈聯同戴祖儀、黃美棋、林穎彤幾位緊貼年輕人文化的藝人，每集與bigbig channel的大專生KOL借題發揮，再配合街訪、遊戲、社會實驗，發掘年輕人天馬行空的創意，分享他們對愛情、生活、社會、校園文化的見解與經歷。這個融合網絡平台與傳統媒體的電視節目，帶大家登入後生仔的多元國度。.(n)

programme.title: 姊妹淘[粵]
programme.desc: 「姊妹嘈」這次暢談道歉的藝術，嘉賓王菲示範反客為主技巧，高招！陳熙蕊採取美食賠罪法，原來她還是「道歉主義者」？寶兒提出先冷靜後抱抱，愛侶互相降溫。道歉難在哪裡？若希坦言最難開口向家人道歉；道歉KOL熙蕊竟曾有「鬥Sorry」的尷尬經歷？「姊妹淘物」，若希推介玫瑰系列護膚品，拆解玫瑰堅果油的靚靚秘密！熙蕊帶來暗瘡修護法寶，解決戴口罩的後遺症。王菲的神奇抹頭髮巾有何功效？還有寶兒的即食雪耳，滋陰之選。.(n)

programme.title: 失驚無神多個媽#34[粵/韓]
programme.desc: 講述講述手工鞋匠孝燮家四兄弟姊妹，在遇到大樓主人兼富者的繼母後發生的故事。.(n)

programme.title: 這一站阿拉伯[粵]
programme.desc: 凱晴在阿曼古建築風格餐廳品嚐傳統早餐，各式配菜加烤餅，怎樣才是阿拉伯人的正宗食法？凱晴更發現中東都有「滷肉飯」、「炒米粉」？置身石油國度，到石油博物館探個究竟，從互動裝置認識鑽油工序，亦可深入了解中東的環保能源發展。再逛逛當地的超市，吸引凱晴的莫過於抵食甜點，凱晴亦一試超市的日用品外送服務。凱晴拜訪當地家庭，與當地人圍坐地上用餐，中東人有甚麼用餐禮儀？屋主更熱情款待凱晴參觀其超大自家農場！.(n)

programme.title: 愛玩客之移動廚房[粵/普]
安樂蝸[粵]
programme.desc: 囝囝逐漸長大，屋主夫婦將十年居所重新裝潢，打造舒適空間。浴缸改建為日式風呂，可增進親子時光；坐鎮客廳的影音組合，男人的浪漫！藝人鄧智堅參觀後，最愛哪個部份？日式設計崇尚簡約自然，着重設計者的精神。曾在日本修讀室內設計的林華明細說和式設計精髓，以及難忘工作體驗。摺疊乾衣機方便收納，乾衣效能又怎樣？留意「妄購SOL」。中式小擺設能為平凡家居添上藝術氣息，主持們到訪中式家品店，搜羅多款獨特又實用的珍藏。.(n)

programme.title: 甜姐兒[粵]
programme.desc: 根莖類甜品口味獨特，適逢正值根莖植物當做季節，三位甜姐兒推介多款精美根莖類甜品，其中包括造型極精緻的紫番薯芭菲、潮州菜必備甜品反沙芋、與花雕雞一同品嚐的台式蜜汁冰芋、西式甜品番薯脆卷等。台式甜品向來深受港人歡迎，甜品達人Chilly示範製作口感煙韌的台式芋圓。「番書仔」陳智燊原來對番薯情有獨鍾，甜姐兒邀請他一同品嚐根莖類蔬菜盛宴。陳智燊飾演的鍾思翰在劇中開設餅店，現實中他可有為女友動手做甜品？他並與甜姐兒暢談他的擇偶條件。.(n)

programme.desc: 年輕人近年善用網絡的影響力改變世界，實現各種瘋狂念頭。陸浩明、麥明詩、馮盈盈聯同戴祖儀、黃美棋、林穎彤幾位緊貼年輕人文化的藝人，每集與bigbig channel的大專生KOL借題發揮，再配合街訪、遊戲、社會實驗，發掘年輕人天馬行空的創意，分享他們對愛情、生活、社會、校園文化的見解與經歷。這個融合網絡平台與傳統媒體的電視節目，帶大家登入後生仔的多元國度。.(n)

programme.title: 咖啡王子#11[粵/韓][PG]
programme.desc: 崔漢杰是一間咖啡店的新任經理，為了令這間咖啡店的業績起死回生，漢杰實行一個創新的方案，就是咖啡店的服務員全部都是年輕的美男子。為了幫補家計，高恩燦女扮男裝，混入這間咖啡店工作。.(n)

programme.title: 小明星大跟班[普]
programme.desc: 台灣綜藝天王吳宗憲與女兒吳姍儒聯手主持，首次搭檔主持激盪出臺灣影視圈兩代關係大突破！.(n)

programme.title: 寵物大本營[粵/日]
programme.desc: 本節目講述藝人松本秀樹人與狗狗主人公“大介”在日本各地縱橫旅行時所遇到的當地各類寵物、當地的各型各色的民眾以及各地的景點和自然風貌，在他們所到之處都會受到當地民眾的熱烈歡迎！.(n)

programme.title: 法國潮什麼[粵]
programme.desc: 梁芷珮接觸法國當地的文化，先跟戲劇大師學習簡單的默劇動作，然後光顧巴黎最古舊的餐廳，細味最地道的洋蔥湯、鴨胸及焦糖燉蛋，再到二手市場尋寶。從巴黎市中心坐約兩小時火車就可到達的南特，是法國有名的藝術城市，藝術品可謂隨處可見。芷珮走到旅客資訊中心，沿著地上的綠線走，遊覽不同的旅遊景點。她參觀了1801年已創立的藝術博物館，在總統也曾光顧的咖啡店流連，還到有約80年歷史的法式薄餅店做學徒。.(n)

programme.title: 無間音樂[粵]
programme.desc: 主持周志康、鄭芷彤送上「勁歌金榜速遞」，公佈「勁歌金榜」頭十位歌曲。冠軍歌是林家謙，其餘位置包括鄭俊弘、羅力威、趙慧珊Aka、洪卓立、HANA菊梓喬；林穎彤、伍富橋；謝東閔、曾樂彤、余香凝。另會帶來SoulJase的挑戰歌。.(n)

programme.title: 世界第一等[粵/普]
programme.desc: 本集主持人會在沖繩體驗在馬路上駕駛小型賽車，隨後品嘗被當地人視為珍寶的超級食物補充養分。而作為空手道的發源地，主持人更會向國寶級大師拜師學藝，再好好把握機會，在擁有多元豐富海洋生態的沖繩挑戰海中巨物。.(n)

programme.title: 小明星大跟班[普]
programme.desc: 台灣綜藝天王吳宗憲與女兒吳姍儒聯手主持，首次搭檔主持激盪出臺灣影視圈兩代關係大突破！.(n)

programme.title: 談判官#22[粵/普]
programme.desc: 童薇用自身經歷勸解謝曉飛，希望他能振作。羅斌邀謝曉飛搬來會所住，宋浩傑帶人砸店威脅羅斌，謝曉飛見狀假意與羅斌決裂。謝曉飛跟恬恬去吃宵夜，幫她和孫昊搭訕。周總得知童薇在幫謝曉飛，警告她不要給公司惹麻煩。.(n)

programme.title: 法國潮什麼[粵]
programme.desc: 梁芷珮、麥凱程帶大家到「美食之都」里昂，先去餐廳品嚐由老闆發辦的「驚喜套餐」，再走入一星米芝蓮廚房，跟大廚學習雕花和擺盤。其後，凱程獨自挑戰室內跳傘，接著會合芷珮，前往法國食神以前每天必去的高級市場，購買新鮮食材。里昂燈光節是當地著名的宗教節目，每年十二月初會舉行一連四天的燈光表演，吸引約四百萬遊客參觀。芷珮和凱程遊走市內，一邊欣賞燈飾，一邊細味充滿里昂特色的甜品、熱紅酒及粟米湯。.(n)

programme.title: 愛玩客之移動廚房[粵/普]
娛樂新聞報道
programme.desc: 每晚緊貼香港娛樂圈的消息，以至世界各地的影視娛樂新聞，報道藝人最新動態、劇集和電影宣傳、演唱會精華、頒獎禮盛況等，甚至遠赴外地採訪娛樂盛事、追蹤各地影星，專訪觀眾熟悉的歌、影、視紅人，讓大家瞬間掌握影視娛樂圈的動態和最新消息。.(n)

programme.title: 環遊慶典世界[粵]
programme.desc: 四位節目主持到不同國家參加慶典，包括馬來西亞、日本、印尼、菲律賓、意大利、緬甸等等，將慶典最完整的一面帶到觀眾面前。.(n)

programme.title: 眼睛去旅行[粵]
programme.desc: 陳約臨參觀上海奢華酒店，環境優美，悠閒池畔Tea、總統套房看日落，住得夠豪夠招積！.(n)

programme.title: #後生仔傾吓偈[粵]
programme.desc: 年輕人近年善用網絡的影響力改變世界，實現各種瘋狂念頭。陸浩明、麥明詩、馮盈盈聯同戴祖儀、黃美棋、林穎彤幾位緊貼年輕人文化的藝人，每集與bigbig channel的大專生KOL借題發揮，再配合街訪、遊戲、社會實驗，發掘年輕人天馬行空的創意，分享他們對愛情、生活、社會、校園文化的見解與經歷。這個融合網絡平台與傳統媒體的電視節目，帶大家登入後生仔的多元國度。.(n)

programme.title: 姊妹淘[粵]
programme.desc: 姊妹們話題數之不盡，主持吳若希、莊思敏、王子涵、張寶兒、陳詩欣、蔡嘉欣齊齊開Talk！「姊妹嘈」暢談兩性關係；「姊點迷津」請來玄學家探討課題；「周圍@」搜羅打卡熱點；還可跟「我要全脂燃」學習，塑造健康體態。藝人亮相「變新男女」，從妝容、髮型、造型着手大改造；「整妝待化」則介紹各式化妝技巧。「#熱搜人物」邀來各界名人，分享成功之道。要了解最新潮物和主持們的心頭好，留意「#熱搜潮物」、「姊妹淘物」。.(n)

programme.title: 失驚無神多個媽#35[粵/韓]
programme.desc: 講述講述手工鞋匠孝燮家四兄弟姊妹，在遇到大樓主人兼富者的繼母後發生的故事。.(n)

programme.title: 旅人視角[粵/普]
programme.desc: 祐宏從宮廷設計的羅東車站出發，展開不一樣的宜蘭旅程。走訪七十年代美國古物店，一睹當年盛行的太空風格產品，更發現激罕飛機座椅、資薪機！把懷舊家具換上新裝，古老亦可變潮流。祐宏穿上浴衣在「小日本」庭園慢活，體驗手沖抹茶。他再遊覽梅花湖風景區，享用一客舒適愜意的湖景下午茶。祐宏來到射擊博物館，要慎防被空氣砲「爆頭」！館內亦有多項射擊設施，讓神射手玩過痛快。置身古堡模樣的親子民宿，觀迎探索神秘的魔法世界！.(n)

programme.title: 愛玩客之移動廚房[粵/普]
覓食四方[粵]
programme.desc: 盧覓雪來到馬來西亞，品嚐正宗的印度咖喱，經過醃製的咖喱魚頭，可以配白飯、印度飯或薄餅一起享用。在吉隆坡也可以品嚐到正宗檳城風味，當端上一碗咖喱麵時，我們有甚麼方法能辨認出它是否來自檳城？.(n)

programme.title: 甜姐兒[粵]
programme.desc: 雪糕的祖先原來是元朝皇帝最愛的「冰酪」，節目先介紹多款富有中國特色的雪糕，一嚐昔日皇室風味。顧客成功拉出指定高度的雪糕便可免費享用作品，三位甜姐兒最後能否成功完成挑戰？之後帶各位欣賞精采雪糕雜技，她們還親自動手製作土耳其炒雪糕。利用家中簡單器具也可製作美味雪糕，甜品達人Max Wu示範自製南瓜合桃朱古力雪糕。自小習武的杜宇航吃慣「夜粥」，面對特別口味和牛、清酒、馬介休雪糕他又能否招架？甜姐兒質疑杜宇航性格含蓄會引來女友不滿，師兄親自回應有關話題。.(n)

programme.desc: 姊妹們話題數之不盡，主持吳若希、莊思敏、王子涵、張寶兒、陳詩欣、蔡嘉欣齊齊開Talk！「姊妹嘈」暢談兩性關係；「姊點迷津」請來玄學家探討課題；「周圍@」搜羅打卡熱點；還可跟「我要全脂燃」學習，塑造健康體態。藝人亮相「變新男女」，從妝容、髮型、造型着手大改造；「整妝待化」則介紹各式化妝技巧。「#熱搜人物」邀來各界名人，分享成功之道。要了解最新潮物和主持們的心頭好，留意「#熱搜潮物」、「姊妹淘物」。.(n)

programme.title: 咖啡王子#12[粵/韓][PG]
programme.desc: 崔漢杰是一間咖啡店的新任經理，為了令這間咖啡店的業績起死回生，漢杰實行一個創新的方案，就是咖啡店的服務員全部都是年輕的美男子。為了幫補家計，高恩燦女扮男裝，混入這間咖啡店工作。.(n)

programme.desc: 講述講述手工鞋匠孝燮家四兄弟姊妹，在遇到大樓主人兼富者的繼母後發生的故事。.(n)

programme.title: 姊姊妹妹動起來[粵]
programme.desc: 夏天到，姊妹們是時候採用有效率的方法keep fit消脂瘦身了！「姊姊妹妹動起來」請來健身教練Jay Poon，教導包含高強度和間歇性訓練的HIIT。Jay示範三個動作，包括鍛鍊心肺功能的Jumping Jack，收緊大腿及臀部肌肉的Squat Side Kick，以及鍛鍊大腿內側、腳掌兩邊肌肉及平衡力的Skater，幫助大家燃燒熱量，促進新陳代謝。.(n)

programme.title: 煮將挑機[韓]
programme.desc: 韓國煮將們靠著李連福主廚全力應戰，延長賽中再下一城，拿下中韓戰第一戰的勝利，然而淺嚐勝利滋味之後，立即來到第二戰的對決地點R酒店，面對R酒店推出的夢幻隊伍，勝利女神會對哪一方露出微笑呢？.(n)

programme.title: 法國潮什麼[粵]
programme.desc: 梁芷珮、麥凱程帶大家到「美食之都」里昂，先去餐廳品嚐由老闆發辦的「驚喜套餐」，再走入一星米芝蓮廚房，跟大廚學習雕花和擺盤。其後，凱程獨自挑戰室內跳傘，接著會合芷珮，前往法國食神以前每天必去的高級市場，購買新鮮食材。里昂燈光節是當地著名的宗教節目，每年十二月初會舉行一連四天的燈光表演，吸引約四百萬遊客參觀。芷珮和凱程遊走市內，一邊欣賞燈飾，一邊細味充滿里昂特色的甜品、熱紅酒及粟米湯。.(n)

programme.title: 無間音樂[粵]
programme.desc: 徐加晴亮相「音樂天空」，透過為樂迷帶來心靈慰藉。加晴訴說新歌靈感源自某天發現家中僅餘半盒口罩，加上想到前線醫護人員的艱難處境，遂靠寫歌來抒發崩潰情緒！新作以疫情為背景，她卻選擇以愛情為題而非發放正能量，又有何原因？為了盡快推出作品，加晴與團隊於十四日內完成創作及MV拍攝，當中記錄了甚麼寫實畫面？加晴坦言受疫情影響工作量遞減，她卻把負面情緒視為創作的推動力；她亦會送上前作。.(n)

programme.title: MIX[粵/日]
programme.desc: 30年前的夏天，明青學園高中靠著王牌投手上杉達也，首次打進甲子園，拿下冠軍，寫下輝煌記錄。此後再也沒有亮眼表現，直到立花兄弟，這對投捕兄弟檔的加入，棒球社似乎有望東山再起，然而打進甲子園的最大阻力，竟然是….(n)

programme.title: 談判官#23[粵/普]
programme.desc: 大家為童薇舉辦的生日派對氣氛十分融洽，正當童薇對著蛋糕許願的時候，夏杉杉帶著秦天宇出現了。秦天宇還主動替童薇結了賬。這一切在謝曉飛的眼中格外刺目，謝曉飛也因為自己無法為童薇做任何事而愧疚不已。.(n)

programme.title: 失驚無神多個媽#36[粵/韓]
programme.desc: 講述講述手工鞋匠孝燮家四兄弟姊妹，在遇到大樓主人兼富者的繼母後發生的故事。.(n)

programme.title: 蒲夜市[粵]
programme.desc: 「蒲夜市」是大多數香港人前赴台灣旅遊的指定動作，而不少當地人亦在夜市吃晚飯和宵夜，可見台灣夜市的美食滋味無窮。除了港人熟悉的士林夜市與饒河街觀光夜市之外，其實台北還有多個深受市內民眾歡迎的夜市。美女主持曾淑雅(Jumbo)會為觀眾精選台北十大夜市的必吃美食清單，如供應蚵仔煎、珍珠奶茶等人氣商戶。想知道最滋味、最地道的台北夜市攻略，大家就要跟隨Jumbo《蒲夜市》！.(n)

programme.title: MASA滋味日常[粵/普]
programme.desc: 百年老店傳承着歷史記憶的味道。MASA老師閒逛台北剝皮寮老街、初嚐青草茶，還特地到訪百年肉圓老店；招牌美食「紅糟肉圓」、「滷肉飯」古早味飄香，不論食材、製法，皆充滿傳統特色。老師這次炮製一道簡易的日式傳統料理「筑前煮」。新鮮牛蒡是當中的靈魂食材，如何保留牛蒡表皮的營養？優質昆布應怎樣挑選？要為蒟蒻去除水分，又有甚麼方法？把牛蒡、蒟蒻、香菇炒香後，再放入雞腿肉熬煮成湯，即成煮物「福岡鄉土風筑前煮」！.(n)

programme.title: MASA滋味日常[粵/普]
programme.desc: 以酒入饌可提升食物的味道層次。MASA老師到訪以酒入菜的創意料理餐廳，「鴨胸芝麻葉沙拉」用蘋果酒輕解芝麻葉的微苦；「松露麻油雞燉飯」可謂米酒麻油雞高貴版；帶柑橘酒香的甜品「彩虹奶酪」，更是繽紛醉人。老師從中取得靈感，炮製一道「燉紅酒豬肉配香香奶油飯」。梅花豬肉片油花分佈適中，口感嫩滑。肉片以紅酒大火燉煮，配上加入牛油拌炒的香飯，西式佳餚透出亞洲風味。老師於進食時還為紅酒燉豬肉巧添鮮忌廉，奶香更濃！.(n)

programme.title: #後生仔傾吓偈[粵]
programme.desc: 港大校友馮盈盈、楓、黃穎君、鄧卓殷暢談母校的舍堂文化。盈盈當年三度申請宿舍，一律無功而還，為何美女沒優勢？港大宿生輩份分明，以「仙制」標籤地位，晉升條件非同小可。13間宿舍相距本部校園有遠有近，幾位校友用一幅圖解釋彼此的「生活時間圈」。HKU宿舍的迎新活動遠近馳名，各種精神和肉體的操練非常要命，令不少人大打退堂鼓，背後目的何在？港大鬼故引人入勝，兩個毫不相干的傳說居然可以湊成連續劇！.(n)

programme.title: 浪遊愛爾蘭[粵]
programme.desc: 陳智燊（Jason）首站帶大家走到距離機場半小時車程的都柏林（Dublin），一條著名的麗菲河將都柏林劃分為南北兩區，麗菲河上的半分橋，是為了紀念滑鐵盧戰役而興建，設計獨特且具歷史意義。Jason化身維京人登上外形像船的維京水陸兩用旅遊車，遊覽都柏林市內16個景點，經歷瘋狂之旅，大呼神奇好玩！結合藝術與科技的都柏林尖塔，Jason搞搞新意思，四處考問當地人尖塔的高度，竟然無人知曉？Jason又參與一年一度的啤酒節「歡樂Party」，品嚐地道啤酒、美食並盡情享受熱鬧氣氛！.(n)

programme.title: 咖啡王子#13[粵/韓][PG]
programme.desc: 崔漢杰是一間咖啡店的新任經理，為了令這間咖啡店的業績起死回生，漢杰實行一個創新的方案，就是咖啡店的服務員全部都是年輕的美男子。為了幫補家計，高恩燦女扮男裝，混入這間咖啡店工作。.(n)

programme.title: 失驚無神多個媽#36[粵/韓]
programme.desc: 講述講述手工鞋匠孝燮家四兄弟姊妹，在遇到大樓主人兼富者的繼母後發生的故事。.(n)

programme.title: C AllStar泰空曼遊[粵]
programme.desc: Jase帶On仔到街邊品嚐地道「粉絲蟹煲」，轉眼會合King和釗峰，一起享用新派泰菜，還化身「情聖」，高談應對女友的心得。精力充沛的四人戴上拳套，接受美女泰拳教練的地獄式訓練，挑戰減磅任務，結果如何？揮灑汗水過後，四子大歎傳統泰式按摩緩解疲累；閒逛著名市集搜羅夏日裝束，還走進有小日本之稱的年輕人熱點，分享文青態度。四子及後踏足泰國音樂大學，跟校內師生切磋交流，並細說昔日街頭演唱點滴與各自夢想。.(n)

programme.title: 夜宵磨[粵]
programme.desc: 香港雖然繁盛，但也不乏寂靜的角落。三位主持往尖沙咀的寧靜空間，於夜幕下竟是品味英式早餐，三位大忙人廢寢忘食，常錯過吃早餐機會，因此對完美早餐倍添幻想。欣欣再約好友曾華倩，與阿范共晉一餐，大談投緣之原因，華倩卻突指與欣欣不太友好？在座均聲言喜愛住家菜，事實上有否入廚房自製盛宴？高海寧及馬賽曾擔任飲食節目主持，今次與阿范一試燒烤串燒。兩位美女竟不避諱點了「墨魚汁炒烏冬」，吃完後兩位美女還能保持美態嗎？.(n)

programme.title: 談判官#23[粵/普]
programme.desc: 大家為童薇舉辦的生日派對氣氛十分融洽，正當童薇對著蛋糕許願的時候，夏杉杉帶著秦天宇出現了。秦天宇還主動替童薇結了賬。這一切在謝曉飛的眼中格外刺目，謝曉飛也因為自己無法為童薇做任何事而愧疚不已。.(n)

programme.title: 帶班o靚仔去冒險[粵/英]
programme.desc: 每集都會帶同兩位青年旅行愛好者尋找世界各地不同景點及冒險旅程。.(n)

programme.title: 超人回來了[韓]
programme.desc: 羅媛用獨自去超市買來的材料與洪爸爸一同做料理。文爸爸帶著JamJam來到KBS電視台看有名的貓咪，偶遇SEVENTEEN偶像組合一同進餐。Sam一家來到澳洲墨爾本Nana家，度過快樂萬聖節。朴爸爸帶著建娜可愛來到艮绝岬遊玩。.(n)

programme.title: 安樂蝸[粵]
programme.desc: 囝囝逐漸長大，屋主夫婦將十年居所重新裝潢，打造舒適空間。浴缸改建為日式風呂，可增進親子時光；坐鎮客廳的影音組合，男人的浪漫！藝人鄧智堅參觀後，最愛哪個部份？日式設計崇尚簡約自然，着重設計者的精神。曾在日本修讀室內設計的林華明細說和式設計精髓，以及難忘工作體驗。摺疊乾衣機方便收納，乾衣效能又怎樣？留意「妄購SOL」。中式小擺設能為平凡家居添上藝術氣息，主持們到訪中式家品店，搜羅多款獨特又實用的珍藏。.(n)

programme.title: 無間音樂[粵]
programme.desc: 「Global Hot Picks」，主持謝文欣和鄭芷彤搜羅多首外語歌MV，包括Meghan Trainor ft. Nicki Minaj、Alicia Keys、Lauv & LANY、Rex Orange County、King Gnu等。.(n)

programme.title: 我的非洲很有事[粵/普]
programme.desc: 很有事團隊開始在馬達加斯加的旅程。他們到當地第二大城市穆隆達瓦，觀賞珍貴的猴麵包樹，更在猴麵包樹大道欣賞日落。然後前往鄰近漁村，了解當地漁民的生活，跟他們交流，最後還進入國家公園尋找狐猴的蹤跡。.(n)

programme.title: #後生仔傾吓偈[粵][PG]
programme.desc: 港大校友馮盈盈、楓、黃穎君、鄧卓殷暢談母校的舍堂文化。盈盈當年三度申請宿舍，一律無功而還，為何美女沒優勢？港大宿生輩份分明，以「仙制」標籤地位，晉升條件非同小可。13間宿舍相距本部校園有遠有近，幾位校友用一幅圖解釋彼此的「生活時間圈」。HKU宿舍的迎新活動遠近馳名，各種精神和肉體的操練非常要命，令不少人大打退堂鼓，背後目的何在？港大鬼故引人入勝，兩個毫不相干的傳說居然可以湊成連續劇！.(n)

programme.title: 台北101種玩法[粵]
programme.desc: 要玩轉台北，當然從101大樓開始！主持余德丞坐高速升降機登上89樓，360度飽覽市內景色，還在集愛之牆許願。拍檔譚凱螢則勇闖101頂樓，在雲霧中刺激漫步。征服過台灣第一高樓後，凱螢化身飛機師！全台唯一純手工打造的飛行模擬器，讓她一嘗駕駛飛機的樂趣。台灣必吃麻辣火鍋、熱炒，德丞光顧的餐廳可一次滿足兩個願望，CP值有多高？凱螢走進「型男」居酒屋，品嚐生牛肉等料理，再到二、三樓酒吧區，盡情飲酒、打卡。.(n)

programme.title: 失驚無神多個媽#36[粵/韓]
programme.desc: 講述講述手工鞋匠孝燮家四兄弟姊妹，在遇到大樓主人兼富者的繼母後發生的故事。.(n)

programme.title: 咖啡王子#14[粵/韓][PG]
programme.desc: 崔漢杰是一間咖啡店的新任經理，為了令這間咖啡店的業績起死回生，漢杰實行一個創新的方案，就是咖啡店的服務員全部都是年輕的美男子。為了幫補家計，高恩燦女扮男裝，混入這間咖啡店工作。.(n)

programme.title: 大台冠軍[粵/日]
programme.desc: 充滿意欲和熱血的節目內，特定的競技範圍、深度的競技內容、通過出演本屆節目，改變自己的人生、創造新的時代.(n)

programme.title: 超人回來了[韓]
programme.desc: 羅媛用獨自去超市買來的材料與洪爸爸一同做料理。文爸爸帶著JamJam來到KBS電視台看有名的貓咪，偶遇SEVENTEEN偶像組合一同進餐。Sam一家來到澳洲墨爾本Nana家，度過快樂萬聖節。朴爸爸帶著建娜可愛來到艮绝岬遊玩。.(n)

programme.title: 帶班o靚仔去冒險[粵/英]
programme.desc: 每集都會帶同兩位青年旅行愛好者尋找世界各地不同景點及冒險旅程。.(n)

programme.title: 談判官#24[粵/普]
programme.desc: 秦天宇告訴童薇謝曉飛住在趙晨曦家, 謝曉飛告訴童薇自己愛上了趙晨曦。童薇回絕了謝曉天的要求, 向公司遞交了辭呈。謝曉飛堅決不肯低頭, 謝曉天告訴他童薇已受到牽連。童薇和謝曉飛分別趕往上海朱家角放生橋。.(n)

programme.title: 法國潮什麼[粵]
programme.desc: 法國小鎮依雲出產的礦泉水賣到街知巷聞，但梁芷珮在依雲卻不用分文，暢飲阿爾卑斯山泉水，之後到以泉水作招徠的水療中心，在裡面泡、游、洗。波爾多投資環保項目，提供十間免費度假屋讓人感受當地郊區的優美，麥凱程帶大家參觀其中兩間。Saint-Martin-Vesubie距離尼斯約九十分鐘車程，那裡有歐洲第一間室內跳瀑布樂園，芷珮試玩過後，前往「世界香水之都」格拉斯，在香水調製師指導下，調製屬於自己的香水。.(n)

programme.title: 愛玩客之移動廚房[粵/普]
娛樂新聞報道
programme.desc: 每晚緊貼香港娛樂圈的消息，以至世界各地的影視娛樂新聞，報道藝人最新動態、劇集和電影宣傳、演唱會精華、頒獎禮盛況等，甚至遠赴外地採訪娛樂盛事、追蹤各地影星，專訪觀眾熟悉的歌、影、視紅人，讓大家瞬間掌握影視娛樂圈的動態和最新消息。.(n)

programme.title: 愛玩客之自遊神[粵/普]
programme.desc: 由賴俊龍及賴東賢帶大家走遍世界各地，包括突尼西亞、韓國、澳洲、日本、瑞士等，吃喝玩樂，體驗不同文化風情。.(n)

programme.title: 眼睛去旅行[粵]
programme.desc: 時間太少、夢想太多，想短時間發掘全球各地的新奇有趣事物，即使不能身歷其中，仍然可用眼睛感受當地的風土人情、用耳朵享受來自世界的聲音，來一趟「眼睛去旅行」。節目透過多位旅遊達人和KOL周奕瑋、陳約臨、蔣家旻、陳婉衡、陳嘉慧、梁芷珮、姜麗文、鄧以婷、嚴崇天、鄭衍峰、蘇可欣等，每集帶來旅遊視頻短片，並提供豐富的相關旅行資訊，介紹生活潮流打卡點，以及認識世界各地趣怪文化習俗，讓你火速成為獨當一面的旅行家！.(n)

programme.title: #後生仔傾吓偈[粵][PG]
programme.desc: 年輕人近年善用網絡的影響力改變世界，實現各種瘋狂念頭。陸浩明、馮盈盈聯同戴祖儀、黃美棋、林穎彤幾位緊貼年輕人文化的藝人，每集與bigbig channel的大專生KOL借題發揮，再配合街訪、遊戲、社會實驗，發掘年輕人天馬行空的創意，分享他們對愛情、生活、社會、校園文化的見解與經歷。這個融合網絡平台與傳統媒體的電視節目，帶大家登入後生仔的多元國度。.(n)

programme.title: 姊妹淘[粵]
programme.desc: 姊妹們話題數之不盡，主持吳若希、莊思敏、王子涵、張寶兒、陳詩欣、蔡嘉欣齊齊開Talk！「姊妹嘈」暢談兩性關係；「姊點迷津」請來玄學家探討課題；「周圍@」搜羅打卡熱點；還可跟「我要全脂燃」學習，塑造健康體態。藝人亮相「變新男女」，從妝容、髮型、造型着手大改造；「整妝待化」則介紹各式化妝技巧。「#熱搜人物」邀來各界名人，分享成功之道。要了解最新潮物和主持們的心頭好，留意「#熱搜潮物」、「姊妹淘物」。.(n)

programme.title: 失驚無神多個媽#37[粵/韓]
programme.desc: 講述講述手工鞋匠孝燮家四兄弟姊妹，在遇到大樓主人兼富者的繼母後發生的故事。.(n)

programme.title: 小滋女孩[粵/普]
programme.desc: 涵方、凱晴品嚐皇后級早餐及冰釀咖啡，享用美食之餘，還可窺見金魚暢游餐廳每個角落？凱晴到「室內大稻埕」朝聖！光顧以迪化街為主題的復古食肆，老派台灣菜一吃難忘；再喝一口新派雞尾酒，宵夜時段的最佳配搭。凱晴一身辣妹造型，帶涵方挑戰非一般的麻辣火鍋！豬腦、水蓮、黃喉、牛栢葉串配辣鍋，多重口感驚喜；不嗜辣的涵方，也可體驗配料十足的香濃酸菜白肉鍋。涵方走進人氣爆燈的永康街，發掘七彩特飲，精緻茶品則是手信佳選。.(n)

CGTN環球瞭望[英] CGTN Global Watch[Eng]
programme.desc: Global Watch is a 60 minute-long news magazine program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China’s perspective on global events. The program, relying on CGTN’s global reporting resources, presents in-depth analysis and coverage of major global issues. The program also presents to-the-point interpretation of Chinese policies and stories that are of interest to foreign audiences, in a style they are familiar with.(n)

芝麻街[英] Sesame Street[Eng]
programme.desc: For more than 45 years, families across America have looked to Sesame Street's beloved Muppets to help children grow smarter, stronger and kinder. Through the program and other Sesame content, children have learned their ABCs, built their inner strength, and developed their moral compass – along with a lasting love of learning.(n)

programme.title: 小花的世界[英] Kiva Can Do![Eng]
programme.desc: Kiva is a seven-year-old girl who knows how to make her own fun and whose imagination knows no bounds. Along with her best friend, Saul Dunne and her dog Angus, Kiva can create absolutely anything and go absolutely anywhere. Whatever she can dream- Kiva Can Do!(n)

programme.title: 開心紙鎮[英] Paper Port[Eng]
programme.desc: Matilda returns to Paper Port to spend her summer holidays. But now her friends Bob and Felicia also know the secret of her strange powers, and they join her and Charlie in their crazy adventures. Matilda will also learn the true history of her grandfather Curlybeard, and she will meet a terrible villain who could jeopardize the very existence of the entire Paper World: the fearsome Captain Corrugated.(n)

programme.title: 我要做球手[英] Hardball[Eng]
programme.desc: When Mikey’s daddy (Daddy) scores a rugby league contract in Sydney with the Western Sydney Bullfrogs, he upends their lives in New Zealand and plonks them in Western Sydney. They move in with Mikey’s auntie (Auntie) who has the people skills of a toaster. During lunchtime on his first day at a new school, Mikey discovers something completely unknown – handball. Mikey doesn’t know it, but this game’s going to change his life.(n)

programme.title: Mary姐的美味莊園[英/粵] Mary Berry's Country House Secrets[Eng/Can]
programme.desc: Mary Berry visits Powderham, a sprawling castle that has evolved for over six hundred years on the estuary of the River Exe. There she meets the young family which have been trying to breathe new life into an old estate ever since they moved in from America two years ago. Mary makes a cream tea for the family and later a midsummer salad and a peach posset for a special party organized for the local community.(n)

programme.title: 手語新聞報道[粵] News Report with Sign Language[Can]

七點半新聞報道[英] NEWS AT SEVEN-THIRTY[Eng]

海洋滋味[英] Food Safari Water[Eng]
programme.desc: Food Safari Water is a vibrant, comprehensive series which not only showcases the great seafood dishes of the world, it explores the traditions of catching and preserving fish, shellfish, crustaceans and sea vegetables - a celebration of hardworking fishermen and women, divers and foragers, processors and smokers as well the brilliant chefs and home cooks who share their treasured recipes and techniques.(n)

programme.title: John Torode 中東風味遊[英] John Torode's Middle East[Eng]
programme.desc: There's been civilisation in Bahrain for a very long time. With civilisation, there comes farming and food, and John wants to know it all. John will explore Bahrain's many culinary curiosities, trying dessert for breakfast, cooking true Bahrain prawn machboos with a local restaurateur, feeling the heat of local delicacies, and making his own version of a Middle Eastern classic: "kibbeh" with lamb and spice.(n)

programme.title: 港生活．港享受[英] Dolce Vita[Eng]
話說當年[英] Today in History[Eng]
翻山涉水上學去[英] The Most Dangerous Ways to School[Eng]
programme.desc: The children from Madibago in the southern Philippines have one of the most spectacular and dangerous ways to school in the world. Some, like twelve-year-old Ryan who lives at the top of a mountain, walk alone through the jungle for hours, others, like eleven-year-old Aible who lives is a coastal fishing village, risk their lives, in order to make it past a steep face of rock and boulders, overgrown with moss and tree roots.(n)

programme.title: 長生「密」語[英][PG] A User's Guide to Cheating Death[Eng][PG]
programme.desc: Sci-fi elements are near us. From FitBits to transhumanism, bodyhacking is a growing trend that cannot be ignore. Meet the scientists, futurists, and aspiring cyborgs as we discover how technology is merging with our bodies as well as changing our society. Tim asks the question: What could this phenomenon mean for our mind and health?(n)

Mike Yung sings a song to his mother.(n)

programme.title: 鬼靈精怪大酒店[英] Hotel Transylvania[Eng]
programme.desc: Hotel Transylvania: The Series focuses on the teenage years of Dracula’s daughter, Mavis, and her three closest friends. With Dracula away on “Official Vampire Business,” Mavis finally sees her chance to show her father what she can do. With the help of her friends, she decides to put her brilliant ideas of how to run the Hotel into motion.(n)

programme.title: 斷食減肥法[英/粵] The Big Crash Diet Experiment[Eng/Can]
programme.desc: Most of the medical professionals give crash diets the bad name, saying they are not nutritionally complete and has yo-yo effect once it's stopped. Oxford professor Susan Jebb decides to test the diet's effectiveness in helping obese volunteers to lose some weight and, hopfully, make some illness, like type 2 diabetes, reverse.(n)

我的麻煩寵物[英/粵] Embarrassing Pets[Eng/Can]
programme.desc: Schnauzer Dennis looks like butter wouldn’t melt, but he has a thing for barking at bikes and joggers. Dog behaviourist Leon is on hand to find out what’s going on with him. Jack Russell Poppy has piled on the pounds. Her growing paunch worries her owner Sarah. Bambi is an overprotective Chihuahua whose yapping at men is putting off boyfriends for owner Jill. Animal behaviourist Caroline is ready to break her barking habit.(n)

programme.title: 美加鐵路遊[英] Great Canadian Railway Journeys[Eng]
programme.desc: The last leg of Michael's epic railroad journey travels across Canada's vast Prairies to the Rockies resort town of Jasper. He explores the life of "les voyageurs", experiences Edmonton's heritage streetcars, rides the vast Athabasca Glacier, marvels at the scale of Canada's forestry industry and discovers how the enchanting beaver, once slaughtered for its fur, is now pampered.(n)

programme.title: 話說當年[英] Today in History[Eng]
世界動物之最[英] World's Greatest Animal Encounters[Eng]
programme.desc: Grasslands are the great stages of the natural world where large animals play out spectacular lives in clear view of people. From the iconic African grasslands the series showcases lions, leopards, elephants, rhinoceros, cheetahs and impalas. Australian kangaroos, wallaby and the wonderfully odd potoroo join American bison and wolves in a grand tour of iconic animals.(n)

programme.title: 橫越阿拉伯[英][PG] Arabia with Levison Wood[Eng][PG]
programme.desc: This episode begins with Levison journeying across the dangerous pirate infested waters of the Gulf of Aden. Upon returning to Saudi Arabia, he is joined by guide Khalid with whom he learns about the region's culture and tradition. Join Levison as he explores the stunning desert of Wadi Rum, follows the pilgrimage road to Mecca, and more.(n)

programme.title: 瞬間看地球[英] Earth Live[Eng]
斷食減肥法[英/粵] The Big Crash Diet Experiment[Eng/Can]

programme.title: 一代天才 : 愛因斯坦#6[英/粵][PG] Genius#6[Eng/Can][PG]
programme.desc: After moving his family to Berlin for work, and to be closer to his new love Elsa, Albert Einstein sets out to prove his theory of general relativity. He wants to send a scientific team to Russia and enlists the help of an astronomer to photograph a solar eclipse, but World War I is about to happen and the expedition goes awry. On the other hand, Einstein's relationship with Mileva reaches rock bottom as his affair becomes less secret.(n)

programme.title: 世界動物之最[英] World's Greatest Animal Encounters[Eng]

programme.title: 銀河守護隊[英][PG] Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy Mission: Break~[Eng][PG]
programme.desc: “Marvel’s Guardians of the Galaxy” features themes of redemption and the importance of friendship and family, told through a series of riveting sequential story arcs. The series follows the newly formed team that finds an artifact keyed only to the DNA of Peter Quill. Upon opening it, Quill unleashes a treasure map leading to a weapon known as the Cosmic Seed, which is capable of giving birth to the next universe.(n)

programme.title: 平約瑟牧師[英/粵] Pastor Joseph Prince[Eng/Can]
權能時間[英/粵] Hour of Power[Eng/Can]
港生活．港享受[英] Dolce Vita[Eng]
明珠雜誌[英] Pearl Magazine[Eng]
programme.desc: The coronavirus continues to hit Hong Kong and the rest of the world. These days, dining out is all about ordering in. Some delivery-only virtual restaurants have developed a recipe for success in tough times. / Hong Kong students facing public examinations are finding different ways to get support.(n)

programme.title: 翻山越野看世界[英/粵] Tough Trucks[Eng/Can]
programme.desc: I'm traveling by trucks through one of Africa's most diverse and spectacular countries , Ethiopia! Starting my trip from Ethiopia's border with Djibouti, I catch a truck across the Afar Desert before heading into the mountains to visit Lalibela's amazing rock-cut churches. I then travel north to 2,000-year-old Axum, once capital of one of Africa's greatest ancient civilizations.(n)

programme.title: FBI#6[英/粵][PG] FBI#6[Eng/Can][PG]
programme.desc: After Senator Lynch’s daughter, Gracie, is kidnapped and held for ransom, the FBI iscalled in to assist with finding the little girl before their time limit expires. However, in order to do so, they must dig into the senator’s past for clues to who did this to his family. They then find out Lynch used to have a brief affair with Nicole Sousa and suspect she is the kidnapper.(n)

programme.title: 奪寶奇Show[英] The Amazing Race[Eng]
programme.desc: Before flying to the Kingdom of Bahrain for the next leg, one of the five remaining teams faces the worst nightmare of a traveler, that of losing a passport. The team has to stay behind, try and get an expedited passport issued while the other four teams board their flight. In Bahrain, the teams have to haul timber, chase down a king, milk a camel and complete a treasure hunt before checking in at the next Pit Stop. Which team gets eliminated?(n)

programme.title: 冰火科學[英/粵][PG] From Ice to Fire The Incredible Science of Temperature[Eng/Can][PG]
programme.desc: Physicist Dr. Helen Czarski explores how life originated in a place where hot and cold meet. In this episode, she investigates why the earth is much warmer than it should be given its distance from the sun, looks into how different animals thermoregulate, partakes in an experiment to see how our bodies deal with the cold, and more. Also, she witnesses a radical surgery which uses temperature to push the boundaries of life.(n)

programme.title: 世界真細小[英] Little Big World[Eng]
programme.desc: The world is smaller than you think in this award-winning time-lapse series. Little Big World turns the most beautiful locations on earth into adorable miniature models. Travel the globe in this bite-size show from Chicago to the Niagara Falls, from the Bahamas to the Austrian Alps.(n)

programme.title: 恩雨之聲[普/粵] Showers of Blessing[Man/Can]
programme.desc: Showers of Blessing productions search for real testimonies from Chinese people around the world. Every episode is an authentic, touching story with real characters and events, and is broadcast in Hong Kong and over 50 other countries and cities, delivering a message of faith, hope, and love to viewers.(n)

programme.title: 數字貓寶[英] Peg + Cat[Eng]
programme.desc: An animated series that follows an adorable little girl, Peg, and her sidekick, Cat, as they encounter unexpected problems that require fun and creative solutions. In order to solve the problems, Peg and her cat must add, subtract and apply basic arithmetic. Their adventures take them to historical far-away lands, art centers in bustling metropolises and the colourful cosmos.(n)

programme.title: 童心看宇宙[英] Little Malabar[Eng]
programme.desc: Little Malabar is very curious and very lucky: he gets to travel into the universe as if it were a big playground, and talk to planets and stars to understand where we come from and how did our world take form one day. In each episode, he gets to experiment one simple natural or scientific notion. Little Malabar is meant for children: everything in this series is at children scale, which means very high!(n)

programme.title: 反斗靈貓[英] The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That![Eng]
programme.desc: Fueled by curiosity and imagination, the Cat leads best friends Nick and Sally on extraordinary adventures into the natural world. With the help of Thing One and Thing Two and their whimsically versatile Thinga-ma-jigger they’ll go anywhere from the bottom of the ocean to the centre of a beehive. The Cat in the Hat ‘knows a lot’ but he doesn’t know everything, making him the perfect guide to learning and fun.(n)

programme.title: 尋根新世代[英] Both Worlds[Eng]
programme.desc: Both Worlds follows a diverse group of young change makers as they seek to transform their communities and gain a greater understanding of their place in the world. A youthful and intimate series, the subjects drive their stories, picking up the camera to tackle subjects like being a teen parent, LGBTQI identity, environmental sustainability and youth empowerment in politics.(n)

programme.title: 知多一點點[英] Do You Know?[Eng]
programme.desc: Do You Know? features YouTube sensation, Maddie Moate, as she makes the leap from the Internet to TV in this series that answers some of the world's most quirky questions - How does a toilet flush? How are ice cream cones made? How does a cat’s tongue work? What makes popcorn pop? How do the bubbles get inside fizzy water?(n)

programme.title: 東瀛入廚易[英] 101 Easy Japanese[Eng]
programme.desc: Learn how to prepare Japanese food like a true master! From traditional classics, to the secrets of home-cooking, learn the art of sushi making, tempura frying and Okonomiyaki-style grilling. Plus, sample regional dishes from Hokkaido to Okinawa to discover the perfect recipe for every occasion. 101 Easy Japanese offers a complete menu.(n)

programme.title: 六十分鐘時事雜誌[英] 60 Minutes[Eng]
programme.desc: Bill Whitaker reports on the urgent scientific race to develop a vaccine and find drugs that can thwart the coronavirus and the deadly illness it causes./ The banker who oversaw the government’s response to the Great Recession in 2008, Kashkari provides insight on the economic impact of covid-19./ Hungary’s populist government is spending billions to encourage woman to have more children to solve its demographic problem.(n)

programme.title: 超鐵人擂台[英][PG] The Titan Games[Eng][PG]
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson redefines the athletic competition, giving exceptional men and women from all walks of life the chance to test their physical strength and mental fortitude for the chance to battle on Mount Olympus in hopes of becoming a Titan. programme.title: 周末大電影:鐵甲奇俠2[英][PG] Weekend Blockbuster:Iron Man 2[Eng][PG]
programme.desc: Robert Downey Jr. returns as billionaire Tony Stark in this thrilling sequel to the worldwide blockbuster. Now that his superhero secret has been revealed, Tony’s life is more intense than ever. Everyone wants in on the Iron Man technology, whether for power or profit…but for Ivan Vanko, it’s revenge! Tony must once again suit up and face his most dangerous enemy yet, but not without a few new allies of his own.(n)

冰火科學[英/粵][PG] From Ice to Fire The Incredible Science of Temperature[Eng/Can][PG]
programme.desc: Physicist Dr. Helen Czarski explores how life originated in a place where hot and cold meet. In this episode, she investigates why the earth is much warmer than it should be given its distance from the sun, looks into how different animals thermoregulate, partakes in an experiment to see how our bodies deal with the cold, and more. Also, she witnesses a radical surgery which uses temperature to push the boundaries of life.(n)
